02081             *   If final point is an "edge pixel", use it's "real" neighbor instead
02082             */
02083             if (tempPoints[final_index].neighbour_pixel != -1) final_index = cPoint->neighbour_pixel;
02084 
02085             return final_index;
02086         }
02087     }
02088 }
02089 
02090 /*
02091 *   Create a surface for uv image sequence format
02092 */
02093 int dynamicPaint_createUVSurface(DynamicPaintSurface *surface)
02094 {
02095     /* Antialias jitter point relative coords   */
02096     float jitter5sample[10] =  {0.0f, 0.0f,
02097                             -0.2f, -0.4f,
02098                             0.2f, 0.4f,
02099                             0.4f, -0.2f,
02100                             -0.4f, 0.3f};
02101     int ty;
02102     int w,h;
02103     int numOfFaces;
02104     char uvname[MAX_CUSTOMDATA_LAYER_NAME];
02105     int active_points = 0;
02106     int error = 0;
02107 
02108     PaintSurfaceData *sData;
02109     DynamicPaintCanvasSettings *canvas = surface->canvas;
02110     DerivedMesh *dm = canvas->dm;
02111 
02112     PaintUVPoint *tempPoints = NULL;
02113     Vec3f *tempWeights = NULL;
02114     MFace *mface = NULL;
02115     MTFace *tface = NULL;
02116     Bounds2D *faceBB = NULL;
02117     int *final_index;
02118     int aa_samples;
02119 
02120     if (!dm) return setError(canvas, "Canvas mesh not updated.");
02121     if (surface->format != MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_F_IMAGESEQ) return setError(canvas, "Can't bake non-\"image sequence\" formats.");
02122 
02123     numOfFaces = dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
02124     mface = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
02125 
02126     /* get uv map */
02127     CustomData_validate_layer_name(&dm->faceData, CD_MTFACE, surface->uvlayer_name, uvname);
02128     tface = CustomData_get_layer_named(&dm->faceData, CD_MTFACE, uvname);
02129 
02130     /* Check for validity   */
02131     if (!tface) return setError(canvas, "No UV data on canvas.");
02132     if (surface->image_resolution < 16 || surface->image_resolution > 8192) return setError(canvas, "Invalid resolution.");
02133 
02134     w = h = surface->image_resolution;
02135 
02136     /*
02137     *   Start generating the surface
02138     */
02139     printf("DynamicPaint: Preparing UV surface of %ix%i pixels and %i faces.\n", w, h, numOfFaces);
02140 
02141     /* Init data struct */
02142     if (surface->data) dynamicPaint_freeSurfaceData(surface);
02143     sData = surface->data = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PaintSurfaceData), "PaintSurfaceData");
02144     if (!surface->data) return setError(canvas, "Not enough free memory.");
02145 
02146     aa_samples = (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_ANTIALIAS) ? 5 : 1;
02147     tempPoints = (struct PaintUVPoint *) MEM_callocN(w*h*sizeof(struct PaintUVPoint), "Temp PaintUVPoint");
02148     if (!tempPoints) error=1;
02149 
02150     final_index = (int *) MEM_callocN(w*h*sizeof(int), "Temp UV Final Indexes");
02151     if (!final_index) error=1;
02152 
02153     tempWeights = (struct Vec3f *) MEM_mallocN(w*h*aa_samples*sizeof(struct Vec3f), "Temp bWeights");
02154     if (!tempWeights) error=1;
02155 
02156     /*
02157     *   Generate a temporary bounding box array for UV faces to optimize
02158     *   the pixel-inside-a-face search.
02159     */
02160     if (!error) {
02161         faceBB = (struct Bounds2D *) MEM_mallocN(numOfFaces*sizeof(struct Bounds2D), "MPCanvasFaceBB");
02162         if (!faceBB) error=1;
02163     }
02164 
02165     if (!error)
02166     for (ty=0; ty<numOfFaces; ty++) {
02167         int numOfVert = (mface[ty].v4) ? 4 : 3;
02168         int i;
02169 
02170         copy_v2_v2(faceBB[ty].min, tface[ty].uv[0]);
02171         copy_v2_v2(faceBB[ty].max, tface[ty].uv[0]);
02172 
02173         for (i = 1; i<numOfVert; i++) {
02174             if (tface[ty].uv[i][0] < faceBB[ty].min[0]) faceBB[ty].min[0] = tface[ty].uv[i][0];
02175             if (tface[ty].uv[i][1] < faceBB[ty].min[1]) faceBB[ty].min[1] = tface[ty].uv[i][1];
02176             if (tface[ty].uv[i][0] > faceBB[ty].max[0]) faceBB[ty].max[0] = tface[ty].uv[i][0];
02177             if (tface[ty].uv[i][1] > faceBB[ty].max[1]) faceBB[ty].max[1] = tface[ty].uv[i][1];
02178 
02179         }
02180     }
02181 
02182     /*
02183     *   Loop through every pixel and check
02184     *   if pixel is uv-mapped on a canvas face.
02185     */
02186     if (!error) {
02187         #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
02188         for (ty = 0; ty < h; ty++)
02189         {
02190             int tx;
02191             for (tx = 0; tx < w; tx++)
02192             {
02193                 int i, sample;
02194                 int index = tx+w*ty;
02195                 PaintUVPoint *tPoint = (&tempPoints[index]);
02196 
02197                 short isInside = 0; /* if point is inside a uv face */
02198 
02199                 float d1[2], d2[2], d3[2], point[5][2];
02200                 float dot00,dot01,dot02,dot11,dot12, invDenom, u,v;
02201 
02202                 /* Init per pixel settings */
02203                 tPoint->face_index = -1;
02204                 tPoint->neighbour_pixel = -1;
02205                 tPoint->pixel_index = index;
02206 
02207                 /* Actual pixel center, used when collision is found    */
02208                 point[0][0] = ((float)tx + 0.5f) / w;
02209                 point[0][1] = ((float)ty + 0.5f) / h;
02210 
02211                 /*
02212                 * A pixel middle sample isn't enough to find very narrow polygons
02213                 * So using 4 samples of each corner too
02214                 */
02215                 point[1][0] = ((float)tx) / w;
02216                 point[1][1] = ((float)ty) / h;
02217 
02218                 point[2][0] = ((float)tx+1) / w;
02219                 point[2][1] = ((float)ty) / h;
02220 
02221                 point[3][0] = ((float)tx) / w;
02222                 point[3][1] = ((float)ty+1) / h;
02223 
02224                 point[4][0] = ((float)tx+1) / w;
02225                 point[4][1] = ((float)ty+1) / h;
02226 
02227 
02228                 /* Loop through samples, starting from middle point */
02229                 for (sample=0; sample<5; sample++) {
02230                     
02231                     /* Loop through every face in the mesh  */
02232                     for (i=0; i<numOfFaces; i++) {
02233 
02234                         /* Check uv bb  */
02235                         if (faceBB[i].min[0] > (point[sample][0])) continue;
02236                         if (faceBB[i].min[1] > (point[sample][1])) continue;
02237                         if (faceBB[i].max[0] < (point[sample][0])) continue;
02238                         if (faceBB[i].max[1] < (point[sample][1])) continue;
02239 
02240                         /*  Calculate point inside a triangle check
02241                         *   for uv0,1,2 */
02242                         sub_v2_v2v2(d1,  tface[i].uv[2], tface[i].uv[0]);   // uv2 - uv0
02243                         sub_v2_v2v2(d2,  tface[i].uv[1], tface[i].uv[0]);   // uv1 - uv0
02244                         sub_v2_v2v2(d3,  point[sample], tface[i].uv[0]);    // point - uv0
02245 
02246                         dot00 = d1[0]*d1[0] + d1[1]*d1[1];
02247                         dot01 = d1[0]*d2[0] + d1[1]*d2[1];
02248                         dot02 = d1[0]*d3[0] + d1[1]*d3[1];
02249                         dot11 = d2[0]*d2[0] + d2[1]*d2[1];
02250                         dot12 = d2[0]*d3[0] + d2[1]*d3[1];
02251 
02252                         invDenom = 1 / (dot00 * dot11 - dot01 * dot01);
02253                         u = (dot11 * dot02 - dot01 * dot12) * invDenom;
02254                         v = (dot00 * dot12 - dot01 * dot02) * invDenom;
02255 
02256                         if ((u > 0) && (v > 0) && (u + v < 1)) {isInside=1;} /* is inside a triangle */
02257 
02258                         /*  If collision wasn't found but the face is a quad
02259                         *   do another check for the second half */
02260                         if ((!isInside) && mface[i].v4)
02261                         {
02262 
02263                             /* change d2 to test the other half */
02264                             sub_v2_v2v2(d2,  tface[i].uv[3], tface[i].uv[0]);   // uv3 - uv0
02265 
02266                             /* test again   */
02267                             dot00 = d1[0]*d1[0] + d1[1]*d1[1];
02268                             dot01 = d1[0]*d2[0] + d1[1]*d2[1];
02269                             dot02 = d1[0]*d3[0] + d1[1]*d3[1];
02270                             dot11 = d2[0]*d2[0] + d2[1]*d2[1];
02271                             dot12 = d2[0]*d3[0] + d2[1]*d3[1];
02272 
02273                             invDenom = 1 / (dot00 * dot11 - dot01 * dot01);
02274                             u = (dot11 * dot02 - dot01 * dot12) * invDenom;
02275                             v = (dot00 * dot12 - dot01 * dot02) * invDenom;
02276 
02277                             if ((u > 0) && (v > 0) && (u + v < 1)) {isInside=2;} /* is inside the second half of the quad */
02278 
02279                         }
02280 
02281                         /*
02282                         *   If point was inside the face
02283                         */
02284                         if (isInside != 0) {
02285 
02286                             float uv1co[2], uv2co[2], uv3co[2], uv[2];
02287                             int j;
02288 
02289                             /* Get triagnle uvs */
02290                             if (isInside==1) {
02291                                 copy_v2_v2(uv1co, tface[i].uv[0]);
02292                                 copy_v2_v2(uv2co, tface[i].uv[1]);
02293                                 copy_v2_v2(uv3co, tface[i].uv[2]);
02294                             }
02295                             else {
02296                                 copy_v2_v2(uv1co, tface[i].uv[0]);
02297                                 copy_v2_v2(uv2co, tface[i].uv[2]);
02298                                 copy_v2_v2(uv3co, tface[i].uv[3]);
02299                             }
02300 
02301                             /* Add b-weights per anti-aliasing sample   */
02302                             for (j=0; j<aa_samples; j++) {
02303                                 uv[0] = point[0][0] + jitter5sample[j*2] / w;
02304                                 uv[1] = point[0][1] + jitter5sample[j*2+1] / h;
02305 
02306                                 barycentric_weights_v2(uv1co, uv2co, uv3co, uv, tempWeights[index*aa_samples+j].v);
02307                             }
02308 
02309                             /* Set surface point face values    */
02310                             tPoint->face_index = i;                         /* face index */
02311                             tPoint->quad = (isInside == 2) ? 1 : 0;     /* quad or tri part*/
02312 
02313                             /* save vertex indexes  */
02314                             tPoint->v1 = mface[i].v1;
02315                             tPoint->v2 = (isInside == 2) ? mface[i].v3 : mface[i].v2;
02316                             tPoint->v3 = (isInside == 2) ? mface[i].v4 : mface[i].v3;
02317 
02318                             sample = 5; /* make sure we exit sample loop as well */
02319                             break;
02320                         }
02321                     }
02322                 } /* sample loop */
02323             }
02324         }
02325 
02326         /*
02327         *   Now loop through every pixel that was left without index
02328         *   and find if they have neighboring pixels that have an index.
02329         *   If so use that polygon as pixel surface.
02330         *   (To avoid seams on uv island edges)
02331         */
02332         #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
02333         for (ty = 0; ty < h; ty++)
02334         {
02335             int tx;
02336             for (tx = 0; tx < w; tx++)
02337             {
02338                 int index = tx+w*ty;
02339                 PaintUVPoint *tPoint = (&tempPoints[index]);
02340 
02341                 /* If point isn't't on canvas mesh  */
02342                 if (tPoint->face_index == -1) {
02343                     int u_min, u_max, v_min, v_max;
02344                     int u,v, ind;
02345                     float point[2];
02346 
02347                     /* get loop area    */
02348                     u_min = (tx > 0) ? -1 : 0;
02349                     u_max = (tx < (w-1)) ? 1 : 0;
02350                     v_min = (ty > 0) ? -1 : 0;
02351                     v_max = (ty < (h-1)) ? 1 : 0;
02352 
02353                     point[0] = ((float)tx + 0.5f) / w;
02354                     point[1] = ((float)ty + 0.5f) / h;
02355 
02356                     /* search through defined area for neighbor */
02357                     for (u=u_min; u<=u_max; u++)
02358                         for (v=v_min; v<=v_max; v++) {
02359                             /* if not this pixel itself */
02360                             if (u!=0 || v!=0) {
02361                                 ind = (tx+u)+w*(ty+v);
02362 
02363                                 /* if neighbor has index    */
02364                                 if (tempPoints[ind].face_index != -1) {
02365 
02366                                     float uv1co[2], uv2co[2], uv3co[2], uv[2];
02367                                     int i = tempPoints[ind].face_index, j;
02368 
02369                                     /* Now calculate pixel data for this pixel as it was on polygon surface */
02370                                     if (!tempPoints[ind].quad) {
02371                                         copy_v2_v2(uv1co, tface[i].uv[0]);
02372                                         copy_v2_v2(uv2co, tface[i].uv[1]);
02373                                         copy_v2_v2(uv3co, tface[i].uv[2]);
02374                                     }
02375                                     else {
02376                                         copy_v2_v2(uv1co, tface[i].uv[0]);
02377                                         copy_v2_v2(uv2co, tface[i].uv[2]);
02378                                         copy_v2_v2(uv3co, tface[i].uv[3]);
02379                                     }
02380 
02381                                     /* Add b-weights per anti-aliasing sample   */
02382                                     for (j=0; j<aa_samples; j++) {
02383 
02384                                         uv[0] = point[0] + jitter5sample[j*2] / w;
02385                                         uv[1] = point[1] + jitter5sample[j*2+1] / h;
02386                                         barycentric_weights_v2(uv1co, uv2co, uv3co, uv, tempWeights[index*aa_samples+j].v);
02387                                     }
02388 
02389                                     /* Set values   */
02390                                     tPoint->neighbour_pixel = ind;              // face index
02391                                     tPoint->quad = tempPoints[ind].quad;        // quad or tri
02392 
02393                                     /* save vertex indexes  */
02394                                     tPoint->v1 = mface[i].v1;
02395                                     tPoint->v2 = (tPoint->quad) ? mface[i].v3 : mface[i].v2;
02396                                     tPoint->v3 = (tPoint->quad) ? mface[i].v4 : mface[i].v3;
02397 
02398                                     u = u_max + 1;  /* make sure we exit outer loop as well */
02399                                     break;
02400                                 }
02401                         }
02402                     }
02403                 }
02404             }
02405         }
02406 
02407         /*
02408         *   When base loop is over convert found neighbor indexes to real ones
02409         *   Also count the final number of active surface points
02410         */
02411         for (ty = 0; ty < h; ty++)
02412         {
02413             int tx;
02414             for (tx = 0; tx < w; tx++)
02415             {
02416                 int index = tx+w*ty;
02417                 PaintUVPoint *tPoint = (&tempPoints[index]);
02418 
02419                 if (tPoint->face_index == -1 && tPoint->neighbour_pixel != -1) tPoint->face_index = tempPoints[tPoint->neighbour_pixel].face_index;
02420                 if (tPoint->face_index != -1) active_points++;
02421             }
02422         }
02423 
02424         /*  Generate surface adjacency data. */
02425         {
02426             int i, cursor=0;
02427 
02428             /* Create a temporary array of final indexes (before unassigned
02429             *  pixels have been dropped) */
02430             for (i=0; i<w*h; i++) {
02431                 if (tempPoints[i].face_index != -1) {
02432                     final_index[i] = cursor;
02433                     cursor++;
02434                 }
02435             }
02436             /* allocate memory */
02437             sData->total_points = w*h;
02438             dynamicPaint_initAdjacencyData(surface, 1);
02439 
02440             if (sData->adj_data) {
02441                 PaintAdjData *ed = sData->adj_data;
02442                 unsigned int n_pos = 0;
02443                 for (ty = 0; ty < h; ty++)
02444                 {
02445                     int tx;
02446                     for (tx = 0; tx < w; tx++)
02447                     {
02448                         int i, index = tx+w*ty;
02449 
02450                         if (tempPoints[index].face_index != -1) {
02451                             ed->n_index[final_index[index]] = n_pos;
02452                             ed->n_num[final_index[index]] = 0;
02453 
02454                             for (i=0; i<8; i++) {
02455 
02456                                 /* Try to find a neighboring pixel in defined direction
02457                                 *  If not found, -1 is returned */
02458                                 int n_target = dynamicPaint_findNeighbourPixel(tempPoints, dm, uvname, w, h, tx, ty, i);
02459 
02460                                 if (n_target >= 0) {
02461                                     ed->n_target[n_pos] = final_index[n_target];
02462                                     ed->n_num[final_index[index]]++;
02463                                     n_pos++;
02464                                 }
02465                                 else if (n_target == ON_MESH_EDGE || n_target == OUT_OF_TEXTURE) {
02466                                     ed->flags[final_index[index]] |= ADJ_ON_MESH_EDGE;
02467                                 }
02468                             }
02469                         }
02470                     }
02471                 }
02472             }
02473         }
02474 
02475         /* Create final surface data without inactive points */
02476         {
02477             ImgSeqFormatData *f_data = MEM_callocN(sizeof(struct ImgSeqFormatData), "ImgSeqFormatData");
02478             if (f_data) {
02479                 f_data->uv_p = MEM_callocN(active_points*sizeof(struct PaintUVPoint), "PaintUVPoint");
02480                 f_data->barycentricWeights = MEM_callocN(active_points*aa_samples*sizeof(struct Vec3f), "PaintUVPoint");
02481 
02482                 if (!f_data->uv_p || !f_data->barycentricWeights) error=1;
02483             }
02484             else error=1;
02485 
02486             sData->total_points = active_points;
02487             
02488             /* in case of allocation error, free everything */
02489             if (error) {
02490                 if (f_data) {
02491                     if (f_data->uv_p) MEM_freeN(f_data->uv_p);
02492                     if (f_data->barycentricWeights) MEM_freeN(f_data->barycentricWeights);
02493                     MEM_freeN(f_data);
02494                 }
02495             }
02496             else {
02497                 int index, cursor = 0;
02498                 sData->total_points = active_points;
02499                 sData->format_data = f_data;
02500 
02501                 for (index = 0; index < (w*h); index++) {
02502                     if (tempPoints[index].face_index != -1) {
02503                         memcpy(&f_data->uv_p[cursor], &tempPoints[index], sizeof(PaintUVPoint));
02504                         memcpy(&f_data->barycentricWeights[cursor*aa_samples], &tempWeights[index*aa_samples], sizeof(Vec3f)*aa_samples);
02505                         cursor++;
02506                     }
02507                 }
02508             }
02509         }
02510     }
02511     if (error==1) setError(canvas, "Not enough free memory.");
02512 
02513     if (faceBB) MEM_freeN(faceBB);
02514     if (tempPoints) MEM_freeN(tempPoints);
02515     if (tempWeights) MEM_freeN(tempWeights);
02516     if (final_index) MEM_freeN(final_index);
02517 
02518     /* Init surface type data */
02519     if (!error) {
02520         dynamicPaint_allocateSurfaceType(surface);
02521 
02522 #if 0
02523         /*  -----------------------------------------------------------------
02524         *   For debug, output pixel statuses to the color map
02525         *   -----------------------------------------------------------------*/
02526         #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
02527         for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++)
02528         {
02529             ImgSeqFormatData *f_data = (ImgSeqFormatData*)sData->format_data;
02530             PaintUVPoint *uvPoint = &((PaintUVPoint*)f_data->uv_p)[index];
02531             PaintPoint *pPoint = &((PaintPoint*)sData->type_data)[index];
02532             pPoint->alpha=1.0f;
02533 
02534             /* Every pixel that is assigned as "edge pixel" gets blue color */
02535             if (uvPoint->neighbour_pixel != -1) pPoint->color[2] = 1.0f;
02536             /* and every pixel that finally got an polygon gets red color   */
02537             if (uvPoint->face_index != -1) pPoint->color[0] = 1.0f;
02538             /* green color shows pixel face index hash  */
02539             if (uvPoint->face_index != -1) pPoint->color[1] = (float)(uvPoint->face_index % 255)/256.0f;
02540         }
02541 
02542 #endif
02543         dynamicPaint_setInitialColor(surface);
02544     }
02545 
02546     return (error == 0);
02547 }
02548 
02549 /*
02550 *   Outputs an image file from uv surface data.
02551 */
02552 void dynamicPaint_outputSurfaceImage(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, char* filename, short output_layer)
02553 {
02554     int index;
02555     ImBuf* ibuf = NULL;
02556     PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
02557     ImgSeqFormatData *f_data = (ImgSeqFormatData*)sData->format_data;
02558     /* OpenEXR or PNG   */
02559     int format = (surface->image_fileformat & MOD_DPAINT_IMGFORMAT_OPENEXR) ? R_IMF_IMTYPE_OPENEXR : R_IMF_IMTYPE_PNG;
02560     char output_file[FILE_MAX];
02561 
02562     if (!sData || !sData->type_data) {setError(surface->canvas, "Image save failed: Invalid surface.");return;}
02563     /* if selected format is openexr, but current build doesnt support one */
02564     #ifndef WITH_OPENEXR
02565     if (format == R_IMF_IMTYPE_OPENEXR) format = R_IMF_IMTYPE_PNG;
02566     #endif
02567     BLI_strncpy(output_file, filename, sizeof(output_file));
02568     BKE_add_image_extension(output_file, format);
02569 
02570     /* Validate output file path    */
02571     BLI_path_abs(output_file, G.main->name);
02572     BLI_make_existing_file(output_file);
02573 
02574     /* Init image buffer    */
02575     ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf(surface->image_resolution, surface->image_resolution, 32, IB_rectfloat);
02576     if (ibuf == NULL) {setError(surface->canvas, "Image save failed: Not enough free memory.");return;}
02577 
02578     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
02579     for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++)
02580     {
02581         int pos=f_data->uv_p[index].pixel_index*4;  /* image buffer position */
02582 
02583         /* Set values of preferred type */
02584         if (output_layer == 1) {
02585             /* wetmap */
02586             if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT) {
02587                 PaintPoint *point = &((PaintPoint*)sData->type_data)[index];
02588                 float value = (point->wetness > 1.0f) ? 1.0f : point->wetness;
02589 
02590                 ibuf->rect_float[pos]=value;
02591                 ibuf->rect_float[pos+1]=value;
02592                 ibuf->rect_float[pos+2]=value;
02593                 ibuf->rect_float[pos+3]=1.0f;
02594             }
02595         }
02596         else if (output_layer == 0) {
02597             /* Paintmap */
02598             if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT) {
02599                 PaintPoint *point = &((PaintPoint*)sData->type_data)[index];
02600 
02601                 /* blend wet and dry layers */
02602                 blendColors(point->color, point->alpha, point->e_color, point->e_alpha, &ibuf->rect_float[pos]);
02603 
02604                 /* Multiply color by alpha if enabled   */
02605                 if (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_MULALPHA) {
02606                     ibuf->rect_float[pos]   *= ibuf->rect_float[pos+3];
02607                     ibuf->rect_float[pos+1] *= ibuf->rect_float[pos+3];
02608                     ibuf->rect_float[pos+2] *= ibuf->rect_float[pos+3];
02609                 }
02610             }
02611             /* displace */
02612             else if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_DISPLACE) {
02613                 float depth = ((float*)sData->type_data)[index];
02614                 if (surface->depth_clamp)
02615                     depth /= surface->depth_clamp;
02616 
02617                 if (surface->disp_type == MOD_DPAINT_DISP_DISPLACE) {
02618                     depth = (0.5f - depth/2.0f);
02619                 }
02620 
02621                 CLAMP(depth, 0.0f, 1.0f);
02622 
02623                 ibuf->rect_float[pos]=depth;
02624                 ibuf->rect_float[pos+1]=depth;
02625                 ibuf->rect_float[pos+2]=depth;
02626                 ibuf->rect_float[pos+3]=1.0f;
02627             }
02628             /* waves */
02629             else if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_WAVE) {
02630                 PaintWavePoint *wPoint = &((PaintWavePoint*)sData->type_data)[index];
02631                 float depth = wPoint->height;
02632                 if (surface->depth_clamp)
02633                         depth /= surface->depth_clamp;
02634                 depth = (0.5f + depth/2.0f);
02635                 CLAMP(depth, 0.0f, 1.0f);
02636 
02637                 ibuf->rect_float[pos]=depth;
02638                 ibuf->rect_float[pos+1]=depth;
02639                 ibuf->rect_float[pos+2]=depth;
02640                 ibuf->rect_float[pos+3]=1.0f;
02641             }
02642         }
02643     }
02644 
02645     /* Set output format, png in case exr isn't supported */
02646     ibuf->ftype= PNG|95;
02647 #ifdef WITH_OPENEXR
02648     if (format == R_IMF_IMTYPE_OPENEXR) {   /* OpenEXR 32-bit float */
02649         ibuf->ftype = OPENEXR | OPENEXR_COMPRESS;
02650     }
02651 #endif
02652 
02653     /* Save image */
02654     IMB_saveiff(ibuf, output_file, IB_rectfloat);
02655     IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
02656 }
02657 
02658 
02659 /***************************** Material / Texture Sampling ******************************/
02660 
02661 /* stores a copy of required materials to allow doing adjustments
02662 *  without interfering the render/preview */
02663 typedef struct BrushMaterials {
02664     Material *mat;
02665     Material **ob_mats;
02666     int tot;
02667 } BrushMaterials;
02668 
02669 /* Initialize materials for brush object:
02670 *  Calculates inverse matrices for linked objects, updates
02671 *  volume caches etc. */
02672 static void dynamicPaint_updateBrushMaterials(Object *brushOb, Material *ui_mat, Scene *scene, BrushMaterials *bMats)
02673 {
02674     /* Calculate inverse transformation matrix
02675     *  for this object */
02676     invert_m4_m4(brushOb->imat, brushOb->obmat);
02677     copy_m4_m4(brushOb->imat_ren, brushOb->imat);
02678 
02679     /* Now process every material linked to this brush object */
02680     if ((ui_mat == NULL) && brushOb->mat && brushOb->totcol) {
02681         int i, tot=(*give_totcolp(brushOb));
02682 
02683         /* allocate material pointer array */
02684         if (tot) {
02685             bMats->ob_mats = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Material*)*(tot), "BrushMaterials");
02686             for (i=0; i<tot; i++) {
02687                 bMats->ob_mats[i] = RE_init_sample_material(give_current_material(brushOb,(i+1)), scene);
02688             }
02689         }
02690         bMats->tot = tot;
02691     }
02692     else {
02693         bMats->mat = RE_init_sample_material(ui_mat, scene);
02694     }
02695 }
02696 
02697 /* free all data allocated by dynamicPaint_updateBrushMaterials() */
02698 static void dynamicPaint_freeBrushMaterials(BrushMaterials *bMats)
02699 {
02700     /* Now process every material linked to this brush object */
02701     if (bMats->ob_mats) {
02702         int i;
02703         for (i=0; i<bMats->tot; i++) {
02704             RE_free_sample_material(bMats->ob_mats[i]);
02705         }
02706         MEM_freeN(bMats->ob_mats);
02707     }
02708     else if (bMats->mat) {
02709         RE_free_sample_material(bMats->mat);
02710     }
02711 }
02712 
02713 /*
02714 *   Get material diffuse color and alpha (including linked textures) in given coordinates
02715 */
02716 void dynamicPaint_doMaterialTex(BrushMaterials *bMats, float color[3], float *alpha, Object *brushOb, const float volume_co[3], const float surface_co[3], int faceIndex, short isQuad, DerivedMesh *orcoDm)
02717 {
02718     Material *mat = bMats->mat;
02719     MFace *mface = orcoDm->getTessFaceArray(orcoDm);
02720 
02721     /* If no material defined, use the one assigned to the mesh face */
02722     if (mat == NULL) {
02723         if (bMats->ob_mats) {
02724             int mat_nr = mface[faceIndex].mat_nr;
02725             if (mat_nr >= (*give_totcolp(brushOb))) return;
02726             mat = bMats->ob_mats[mat_nr];
02727             if (mat == NULL) return;    /* No material assigned */
02728         }
02729         else return;
02730     }
02731 
02732     RE_sample_material_color(mat, color, alpha, volume_co, surface_co, faceIndex, isQuad, orcoDm, brushOb);
02733 }
02734 
02735 
02736 /***************************** Ray / Nearest Point Utils ******************************/
02737 
02738 
02739 /*  A modified callback to bvh tree raycast. The tree must bust have been built using bvhtree_from_mesh_faces.
02740 *   userdata must be a BVHMeshCallbackUserdata built from the same mesh as the tree.
02741 *  
02742 *   To optimize brush detection speed this doesn't calculate hit coordinates or normal.
02743 *   If ray hit the second half of a quad, no[0] is set to 1.0f.
02744 */
02745 static void mesh_faces_spherecast_dp(void *userdata, int index, const BVHTreeRay *ray, BVHTreeRayHit *hit)
02746 {
02747     const BVHTreeFromMesh *data = (BVHTreeFromMesh*) userdata;
02748     MVert *vert = data->vert;
02749     MFace *face = data->face + index;
02750     short quad = 0;
02751 
02752     float *t0, *t1, *t2, *t3;
02753     t0 = vert[ face->v1 ].co;
02754     t1 = vert[ face->v2 ].co;
02755     t2 = vert[ face->v3 ].co;
02756     t3 = face->v4 ? vert[ face->v4].co : NULL;
02757 
02758     do
02759     {   
02760         float dist = bvhtree_ray_tri_intersection(ray, hit->dist, t0, t1, t2);
02761 
02762         if (dist >= 0 && dist < hit->dist)
02763         {
02764             hit->index = index;
02765             hit->dist = dist;
02766             hit->no[0] = (quad) ? 1.0f : 0.0f;
02767         }
02768 
02769         t1 = t2;
02770         t2 = t3;
02771         t3 = NULL;
02772         quad = 1;
02773 
02774     } while (t2);
02775 }
02776 
02777 /* A modified callback to bvh tree nearest point. The tree must bust have been built using bvhtree_from_mesh_faces.
02778 *  userdata must be a BVHMeshCallbackUserdata built from the same mesh as the tree.
02779 *  
02780 *   To optimize brush detection speed this doesn't calculate hit normal.
02781 *   If ray hit the second half of a quad, no[0] is set to 1.0f, else 0.0f
02782 */
02783 static void mesh_faces_nearest_point_dp(void *userdata, int index, const float *co, BVHTreeNearest *nearest)
02784 {
02785     const BVHTreeFromMesh *data = (BVHTreeFromMesh*) userdata;
02786     MVert *vert = data->vert;
02787     MFace *face = data->face + index;
02788     short quad = 0;
02789 
02790     float *t0, *t1, *t2, *t3;
02791     t0 = vert[ face->v1 ].co;
02792     t1 = vert[ face->v2 ].co;
02793     t2 = vert[ face->v3 ].co;
02794     t3 = face->v4 ? vert[ face->v4].co : NULL;
02795 
02796     do
02797     {   
02798         float nearest_tmp[3], dist;
02799         int vertex, edge;
02800         
02801         dist = nearest_point_in_tri_surface(t0, t1, t2, co, &vertex, &edge, nearest_tmp);
02802         if (dist < nearest->dist)
02803         {
02804             nearest->index = index;
02805             nearest->dist = dist;
02806             copy_v3_v3(nearest->co, nearest_tmp);
02807             nearest->no[0] = (quad) ? 1.0f : 0.0f;
02808         }
02809 
02810         t1 = t2;
02811         t2 = t3;
02812         t3 = NULL;
02813         quad = 1;
02814 
02815     } while (t2);
02816 }
02817 
02818 
02819 /***************************** Brush Painting Calls ******************************/
02820 
02821 /*
02822 *   Mix color values to canvas point.
02823 *
02824 *   surface : canvas surface
02825 *   index : surface point index
02826 *   paintFlags : paint object flags
02827 *   paintColor,Alpha,Wetness : to be mixed paint values
02828 *   timescale : value used to adjust time dependand
02829 *               operations when using substeps
02830 */
02831 static void dynamicPaint_mixPaintColors(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, int index, int paintFlags, float *paintColor, float *paintAlpha, float *paintWetness, float *timescale)
02832 {
02833     PaintPoint *pPoint = &((PaintPoint*)surface->data->type_data)[index];
02834 
02835     /* Add paint    */
02836     if (!(paintFlags & MOD_DPAINT_ERASE)) {
02837         float mix[4];
02838         float temp_alpha = (*paintAlpha) * ((paintFlags & MOD_DPAINT_ABS_ALPHA) ? 1.0f : (*timescale));
02839 
02840         /* mix brush color with wet layer color */
02841         blendColors(pPoint->e_color, pPoint->e_alpha, paintColor, temp_alpha, mix);
02842         copy_v3_v3(pPoint->e_color, mix);
02843 
02844         /* mix wetness and alpha depending on selected alpha mode */
02845         if (paintFlags & MOD_DPAINT_ABS_ALPHA) {
02846             /* update values to the brush level unless theyre higher already */
02847             if (pPoint->e_alpha < (*paintAlpha)) pPoint->e_alpha = (*paintAlpha);
02848             if (pPoint->wetness < (*paintWetness)) pPoint->wetness = (*paintWetness);
02849         }
02850         else {
02851             float wetness = (*paintWetness);
02852             CLAMP(wetness, 0.0f, 1.0f);
02853             pPoint->e_alpha = mix[3];
02854             pPoint->wetness = pPoint->wetness*(1.0f-wetness) + wetness;
02855         }
02856 
02857         if (pPoint->wetness<MIN_WETNESS) pPoint->wetness = MIN_WETNESS;
02858 
02859         pPoint->state = DPAINT_PAINT_NEW;
02860     }
02861     /* Erase paint  */
02862     else {
02863         float a_ratio, a_highest;
02864         float wetness;
02865         float invFact = 1.0f - (*paintAlpha);
02866 
02867         /*
02868         *   Make highest alpha to match erased value
02869         *   but maintain alpha ratio
02870         */
02871         if (paintFlags & MOD_DPAINT_ABS_ALPHA) {
02872             a_highest = (pPoint->e_alpha > pPoint->alpha) ? pPoint->e_alpha : pPoint->alpha;
02873             if (a_highest > invFact) {
02874                 a_ratio = invFact / a_highest;
02875 
02876                 pPoint->e_alpha *= a_ratio;
02877                 pPoint->alpha *= a_ratio;
02878             }
02879         }
02880         else {
02881             pPoint->e_alpha -= (*paintAlpha) * (*timescale);
02882             if (pPoint->e_alpha < 0.0f) pPoint->e_alpha = 0.0f;
02883             pPoint->alpha -= (*paintAlpha) * (*timescale);
02884             if (pPoint->alpha < 0.0f) pPoint->alpha = 0.0f;
02885         }
02886 
02887         wetness = (1.0f - (*paintWetness)) * pPoint->e_alpha;
02888         if (pPoint->wetness > wetness) pPoint->wetness = wetness;
02889     }
02890 }
02891 
02892 /* applies given brush intersection value for wave surface */
02893 static void dynamicPaint_mixWaveHeight(PaintWavePoint *wPoint, DynamicPaintBrushSettings *brush, float isect_height)
02894 {
02895     float isect_change = isect_height - wPoint->brush_isect;
02896     int hit = 0;
02897     /* intersection marked regardless of brush type or hit */
02898     wPoint->brush_isect = isect_height;
02899     wPoint->state = DPAINT_WAVE_ISECT_CHANGED;
02900 
02901     isect_height *= brush->wave_factor;
02902 
02903     /* determine hit depending on wave_factor */
02904     if (brush->wave_factor > 0.0f && wPoint->height > isect_height)
02905         hit = 1;
02906     else if (brush->wave_factor < 0.0f && wPoint->height < isect_height)
02907         hit = 1;
02908 
02909     if (hit) {
02910         if (brush->wave_type == MOD_DPAINT_WAVEB_DEPTH) {
02911             wPoint->height = isect_height;
02912             wPoint->state = DPAINT_WAVE_OBSTACLE;
02913             wPoint->velocity = 0.0f;
02914         }
02915         else if (brush->wave_type == MOD_DPAINT_WAVEB_FORCE)
02916             wPoint->velocity = isect_height;
02917         else if (brush->wave_type == MOD_DPAINT_WAVEB_REFLECT)
02918             wPoint->state = DPAINT_WAVE_REFLECT_ONLY;
02919         else if (brush->wave_type == MOD_DPAINT_WAVEB_CHANGE) {
02920             if (isect_change < 0.0f)
02921                 wPoint->height += isect_change*brush->wave_factor;
02922         }
02923     }
02924 }
02925 
02926 /*
02927 *   add brush results to the surface data depending on surface type
02928 */
02929 static void dynamicPaint_updatePointData(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, unsigned int index, DynamicPaintBrushSettings *brush,
02930                                          float paint[3], float influence, float depth, float vel_factor, float timescale)
02931 {
02932         PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
02933         float strength;
02934 
02935         /* apply influence scale */
02936         influence *= surface->influence_scale;
02937         depth *= surface->influence_scale;
02938 
02939         strength = influence * brush->alpha;
02940         CLAMP(strength, 0.0f, 1.0f);
02941 
02942         /* Sample velocity colorband if required */
02943         if (brush->flags & (MOD_DPAINT_VELOCITY_ALPHA|MOD_DPAINT_VELOCITY_COLOR|MOD_DPAINT_VELOCITY_DEPTH)) {
02944             float coba_res[4];
02945             vel_factor /= brush->max_velocity;
02946             CLAMP(vel_factor, 0.0f, 1.0f);
02947 
02948             if (do_colorband(brush->vel_ramp, vel_factor, coba_res)) {
02949                 if (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_VELOCITY_COLOR) {
02950                     paint[0] = coba_res[0];
02951                     paint[1] = coba_res[1];
02952                     paint[2] = coba_res[2];
02953                 }
02954                 if (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_VELOCITY_ALPHA)
02955                     strength *= coba_res[3];
02956                 if (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_VELOCITY_DEPTH)
02957                     depth *= coba_res[3];
02958             }
02959         }
02960 
02961         /* mix paint surface */
02962         if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT) {
02963 
02964             float paintWetness = brush->wetness * strength;
02965             float paintAlpha = strength;
02966 
02967             dynamicPaint_mixPaintColors(surface, index, brush->flags, paint, &paintAlpha, &paintWetness, &timescale);
02968 
02969         }
02970         /* displace surface */
02971         else if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_DISPLACE) {
02972             float *value = (float*)sData->type_data;
02973 
02974             if (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_DISP_INCREMENTAL)
02975                 depth = value[index] + depth;
02976 
02977             if (surface->depth_clamp) {
02978                 CLAMP(depth, 0.0f-surface->depth_clamp, surface->depth_clamp);
02979             }
02980 
02981             if (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_ERASE) {
02982                 value[index] *= (1.0f - strength);
02983                 if (value[index] < 0.0f) value[index] = 0.0f;
02984             }
02985             else {
02986                 if (value[index] < depth) value[index] = depth;
02987             }
02988         }
02989         /* vertex weight group surface */
02990         else if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_WEIGHT) {
02991             float *value = (float*)sData->type_data;
02992 
02993             if (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_ERASE) {
02994                 value[index] *= (1.0f - strength);
02995                 if (value[index] < 0.0f) value[index] = 0.0f;
02996             }
02997             else {
02998                 if (value[index] < strength) value[index] = strength;
02999             }
03000         }
03001         /* wave surface */
03002         else if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_WAVE) {
03003             if (brush->wave_clamp) {
03004                 CLAMP(depth, 0.0f-brush->wave_clamp, brush->wave_clamp);
03005             }
03006 
03007             dynamicPaint_mixWaveHeight(&((PaintWavePoint*)sData->type_data)[index],
03008                 brush, 0.0f-depth);
03009         }
03010 
03011         /* doing velocity based painting */
03012         if (sData->bData->brush_velocity) {
03013             sData->bData->brush_velocity[index*4+3] *= influence;
03014         }
03015 }
03016 
03017 /* checks whether surface and brush bounds intersect depending on brush type */
03018 static int meshBrush_boundsIntersect(Bounds3D *b1, Bounds3D *b2, DynamicPaintBrushSettings *brush, float brush_radius)
03019 {
03020     if (brush->collision == MOD_DPAINT_COL_VOLUME)
03021         return boundsIntersect(b1, b2);
03022     else if (brush->collision == MOD_DPAINT_COL_DIST || brush->collision == MOD_DPAINT_COL_VOLDIST)
03023         return boundsIntersectDist(b1, b2, brush_radius);
03024     else return 1;
03025 }
03026 
03027 /* calculate velocity for mesh vertices */
03028 static void dynamicPaint_brushMeshCalculateVelocity(Scene *scene, Object *ob, DynamicPaintBrushSettings *brush, Vec3f **brushVel, float timescale)
03029 {
03030     int i;
03031     float prev_obmat[4][4];
03032     DerivedMesh *dm_p, *dm_c;
03033     MVert *mvert_p, *mvert_c;
03034     int numOfVerts_p, numOfVerts_c;
03035 
03036     float cur_sfra = scene->r.subframe;
03037     int cur_fra = scene->r.cfra;
03038     float prev_sfra = cur_sfra - timescale;
03039     int prev_fra = cur_fra;
03040 
03041     if (prev_sfra < 0.0f) {
03042         prev_sfra += 1.0f;
03043         prev_fra = cur_fra - 1;
03044     }
03045 
03046     /* previous frame dm */
03047     scene->r.cfra = prev_fra;
03048     scene->r.subframe = prev_sfra;
03049 
03050     subframe_updateObject(scene, ob, UPDATE_EVERYTHING, BKE_curframe(scene));
03051     dm_p = CDDM_copy(brush->dm);
03052     numOfVerts_p = dm_p->getNumVerts(dm_p);
03053     mvert_p = dm_p->getVertArray(dm_p);
03054     copy_m4_m4(prev_obmat, ob->obmat);
03055 
03056     /* current frame dm */
03057     scene->r.cfra = cur_fra;
03058     scene->r.subframe = cur_sfra;
03059 
03060     subframe_updateObject(scene, ob, UPDATE_EVERYTHING, BKE_curframe(scene));
03061     dm_c = brush->dm;
03062     numOfVerts_c = dm_c->getNumVerts(dm_c);
03063     mvert_c = dm_p->getVertArray(dm_c);
03064 
03065     (*brushVel) = (struct Vec3f *) MEM_mallocN(numOfVerts_c*sizeof(Vec3f), "Dynamic Paint brush velocity");
03066     if (!(*brushVel)) return;
03067 
03068     /* if mesh is constructive -> num of verts has changed,
03069     *  only use current frame derived mesh */
03070     if (numOfVerts_p != numOfVerts_c)
03071         mvert_p = mvert_c;
03072 
03073     /* calculate speed */
03074     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
03075     for (i=0; i<numOfVerts_c; i++) {
03076         float p1[3], p2[3];
03077 
03078         copy_v3_v3(p1, mvert_p[i].co);
03079         mul_m4_v3(prev_obmat, p1);
03080 
03081         copy_v3_v3(p2, mvert_c[i].co);
03082         mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, p2);
03083 
03084         sub_v3_v3v3((*brushVel)[i].v, p2, p1);
03085         mul_v3_fl((*brushVel)[i].v, 1.0f/timescale);
03086     }
03087 
03088     dm_p->release(dm_p);
03089 }
03090 
03091 /* calculate velocity for object center point */
03092 static void dynamicPaint_brushObjectCalculateVelocity(Scene *scene, Object *ob, Vec3f *brushVel, float timescale)
03093 {
03094     float prev_obmat[4][4];
03095     float cur_loc[3] = {0.0f}, prev_loc[3] = {0.0f};
03096 
03097     float cur_sfra = scene->r.subframe;
03098     int cur_fra = scene->r.cfra;
03099     float prev_sfra = cur_sfra - timescale;
03100     int prev_fra = cur_fra;
03101 
03102     if (prev_sfra < 0.0f) {
03103         prev_sfra += 1.0f;
03104         prev_fra = cur_fra - 1;
03105     }
03106 
03107     /* previous frame dm */
03108     scene->r.cfra = prev_fra;
03109     scene->r.subframe = prev_sfra;
03110     subframe_updateObject(scene, ob, UPDATE_PARENTS, BKE_curframe(scene));
03111     copy_m4_m4(prev_obmat, ob->obmat);
03112 
03113     /* current frame dm */
03114     scene->r.cfra = cur_fra;
03115     scene->r.subframe = cur_sfra;
03116     subframe_updateObject(scene, ob, UPDATE_PARENTS, BKE_curframe(scene));
03117 
03118     /* calculate speed */
03119     mul_m4_v3(prev_obmat, prev_loc);
03120     mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, cur_loc);
03121 
03122     sub_v3_v3v3(brushVel->v, cur_loc, prev_loc);
03123     mul_v3_fl(brushVel->v, 1.0f/timescale);
03124 }
03125 
03126 /*
03127 *   Paint a brush object mesh to the surface
03128 */
03129 static int dynamicPaint_paintMesh(DynamicPaintSurface *surface,
03130                                   DynamicPaintBrushSettings *brush,
03131                                   Object *brushOb,
03132                                   BrushMaterials *bMats,
03133                                   Scene *scene,
03134                                   float timescale)
03135 {
03136     PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
03137     PaintBakeData *bData = sData->bData;
03138     DerivedMesh *dm = NULL;
03139     Vec3f *brushVelocity = NULL;
03140     MVert *mvert = NULL;
03141     MFace *mface = NULL;
03142 
03143     if (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_USES_VELOCITY)
03144         dynamicPaint_brushMeshCalculateVelocity(scene, brushOb, brush, &brushVelocity, timescale);
03145 
03146     if (!brush->dm) return 0;
03147     {
03148         BVHTreeFromMesh treeData = {0};
03149         float avg_brushNor[3] = {0.0f};
03150         float brush_radius = brush->paint_distance * surface->radius_scale;
03151         int numOfVerts;
03152         int ii;
03153         Bounds3D mesh_bb = {0};
03154         VolumeGrid *grid = bData->grid;
03155 
03156         dm = CDDM_copy(brush->dm);
03157         mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
03158         mface = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
03159         numOfVerts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
03160 
03161         /*  Transform collider vertices to global space
03162         *   (Faster than transforming per surface point
03163         *   coordinates and normals to object space) */
03164         for (ii=0; ii<numOfVerts; ii++) {
03165             mul_m4_v3(brushOb->obmat, mvert[ii].co);
03166             boundInsert(&mesh_bb, mvert[ii].co);
03167 
03168             /* for proximity project calculate average normal */
03169             if (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_PROX_PROJECT && brush->collision != MOD_DPAINT_COL_VOLUME) {
03170                 float nor[3];
03171                 normal_short_to_float_v3(nor, mvert[ii].no);
03172                 mul_mat3_m4_v3(brushOb->obmat, nor);
03173                 normalize_v3(nor);
03174 
03175                 add_v3_v3(avg_brushNor, nor);
03176             }
03177         }
03178 
03179         if (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_PROX_PROJECT && brush->collision != MOD_DPAINT_COL_VOLUME) {
03180             mul_v3_fl(avg_brushNor, 1.0f/(float)numOfVerts);
03181             /* instead of null vector use positive z */
03182             if (!(MIN3(avg_brushNor[0],avg_brushNor[1],avg_brushNor[2])))
03183                 avg_brushNor[2] = 1.0f;
03184             else
03185                 normalize_v3(avg_brushNor);
03186         }
03187 
03188         /* check bounding box collision */
03189         if (grid && meshBrush_boundsIntersect(&grid->grid_bounds, &mesh_bb, brush, brush_radius))
03190         /* Build a bvh tree from transformed vertices   */
03191         if (bvhtree_from_mesh_faces(&treeData, dm, 0.0f, 4, 8))
03192         {
03193             int c_index;
03194             int total_cells = grid->dim[0]*grid->dim[1]*grid->dim[2];
03195 
03196             /* loop through space partitioning grid */
03197             for (c_index=0; c_index<total_cells; c_index++) {
03198                 int id;
03199 
03200                 /* check grid cell bounding box */
03201                 if (!grid->s_num[c_index] || !meshBrush_boundsIntersect(&grid->bounds[c_index], &mesh_bb, brush, brush_radius))
03202                     continue;
03203 
03204                 /* loop through cell points and process brush */
03205                 #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
03206                 for (id = 0; id < grid->s_num[c_index]; id++)
03207                 {
03208                     int index = grid->t_index[grid->s_pos[c_index] + id];
03209                     int ss, samples = bData->s_num[index];
03210                     float total_sample = (float)samples;
03211                     float brushStrength = 0.0f; /* brush influence factor */
03212                     float depth = 0.0f;     /* brush intersection depth */
03213                     float velocity_val = 0.0f;
03214 
03215                     float paintColor[3] = {0.0f};
03216                     int numOfHits = 0;
03217 
03218                     /* for image sequence anti-aliasing, use gaussian factors */
03219                     if (samples > 1 && surface->format == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_F_IMAGESEQ)
03220                         total_sample = gaussianTotal;
03221 
03222                     /* Supersampling    */
03223                     for (ss=0; ss<samples; ss++)
03224                     {
03225 
03226                         float ray_start[3], ray_dir[3];
03227                         float sample_factor = 0.0f;
03228                         float sampleStrength = 0.0f;
03229                         BVHTreeRayHit hit;
03230                         BVHTreeNearest nearest;
03231                         short hit_found = 0;
03232 
03233                         /* volume sample */
03234                         float volume_factor = 0.0f;
03235                         /* proximity sample */
03236                         float proximity_factor = 0.0f;
03237                         float prox_colorband[4] = {0.0f};
03238                         int inner_proximity = (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_INVERSE_PROX && 
03239                                                    brush->collision == MOD_DPAINT_COL_VOLDIST);
03240 
03241                         /* hit data */
03242                         float hitCoord[3];
03243                         int hitFace = -1;
03244                         short hitQuad = 0;
03245 
03246                         /* Supersampling factor */
03247                         if (samples > 1 && surface->format == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_F_IMAGESEQ)
03248                             sample_factor = gaussianFactors[ss];
03249                         else
03250                             sample_factor = 1.0f;
03251 
03252                         /* Get current sample position in world coordinates */
03253                         copy_v3_v3(ray_start, bData->realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]+ss].v);
03254                         copy_v3_v3(ray_dir, bData->bNormal[index].invNorm);
03255 
03256                         /* a simple hack to minimize chance of ray leaks at identical ray <-> edge locations */
03257                         add_v3_fl(ray_start, 0.001f);
03258 
03259                         hit.index = -1;
03260                         hit.dist = 9999;
03261                         nearest.index = -1;
03262                         nearest.dist = brush_radius * brush_radius; /* find_nearest uses squared distance */
03263 
03264                         /* Check volume collision   */
03265                         if (brush->collision == MOD_DPAINT_COL_VOLUME || brush->collision == MOD_DPAINT_COL_VOLDIST)
03266                         if (BLI_bvhtree_ray_cast(treeData.tree, ray_start, ray_dir, 0.0f, &hit, mesh_faces_spherecast_dp, &treeData) != -1)
03267                         {
03268                             /* We hit a triangle, now check if collision point normal is facing the point   */
03269 
03270                             /*  For optimization sake, hit point normal isn't calculated in ray cast loop   */
03271                             int v1=mface[hit.index].v1, v2=mface[hit.index].v2, v3=mface[hit.index].v3, quad=(hit.no[0] == 1.0f);
03272                             float dot;
03273 
03274                             if (quad) {v2=mface[hit.index].v3; v3=mface[hit.index].v4;}
03275                             normal_tri_v3( hit.no, mvert[v1].co, mvert[v2].co, mvert[v3].co);
03276                             dot = ray_dir[0]*hit.no[0] + ray_dir[1]*hit.no[1] + ray_dir[2]*hit.no[2];
03277 
03278                             /*  If ray and hit face normal are facing same direction
03279                             *   hit point is inside a closed mesh. */
03280                             if (dot>=0)
03281                             {
03282                                 float dist = hit.dist;
03283                                 int f_index = hit.index;
03284 
03285                                 /* Also cast a ray in opposite direction to make sure
03286                                 *  point is at least surrounded by two brush faces */
03287                                 negate_v3(ray_dir);
03288                                 hit.index = -1;
03289                                 hit.dist = 9999;
03290 
03291                                 BLI_bvhtree_ray_cast(treeData.tree, ray_start, ray_dir, 0.0f, &hit, mesh_faces_spherecast_dp, &treeData);
03292 
03293                                 if (hit.index != -1) {
03294                                     /* Add factor on supersample filter */
03295                                     volume_factor = 1.0f;
03296                                     hit_found = HIT_VOLUME;
03297 
03298                                     /* Mark hit info */
03299                                     madd_v3_v3v3fl(hitCoord, ray_start, ray_dir, hit.dist); /* Calculate final hit coordinates */
03300                                     depth += dist*sample_factor;
03301                                     hitFace = f_index;
03302                                     hitQuad = quad;
03303                                 }
03304                             }
03305                         }
03306                     
03307                         /* Check proximity collision    */
03308                         if ((brush->collision == MOD_DPAINT_COL_DIST || brush->collision == MOD_DPAINT_COL_VOLDIST) &&
03309                             (!hit_found || (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_INVERSE_PROX)))
03310                         {
03311                             float proxDist = -1.0f;
03312                             float hitCo[3];
03313                             short hQuad;
03314                             int face;
03315 
03316                             /* if inverse prox and no hit found, skip this sample */
03317                             if (inner_proximity && !hit_found) continue;
03318 
03319                             /* If pure distance proximity, find the nearest point on the mesh */
03320                             if (!(brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_PROX_PROJECT)) {
03321                                 if (BLI_bvhtree_find_nearest(treeData.tree, ray_start, &nearest, mesh_faces_nearest_point_dp, &treeData) != -1) {
03322                                     proxDist = sqrtf(nearest.dist);
03323                                     copy_v3_v3(hitCo, nearest.co);
03324                                     hQuad = (nearest.no[0] == 1.0f);
03325                                     face = nearest.index;
03326                                 }
03327                             }
03328                             else { /* else cast a ray in defined projection direction */
03329                                 float proj_ray[3] = {0.0f};
03330 
03331                                 if (brush->ray_dir == MOD_DPAINT_RAY_CANVAS) {
03332                                     copy_v3_v3(proj_ray, bData->bNormal[index].invNorm);
03333                                     negate_v3(proj_ray);
03334                                 }
03335                                 else if (brush->ray_dir == MOD_DPAINT_RAY_BRUSH_AVG) {
03336                                     copy_v3_v3(proj_ray, avg_brushNor);
03337                                 }
03338                                 else { /* MOD_DPAINT_RAY_ZPLUS */
03339                                     proj_ray[2] = 1.0f;
03340                                 }
03341                                 hit.index = -1;
03342                                 hit.dist = brush_radius;
03343 
03344                                 /* Do a face normal directional raycast, and use that distance  */
03345                                 if (BLI_bvhtree_ray_cast(treeData.tree, ray_start, proj_ray, 0.0f, &hit, mesh_faces_spherecast_dp, &treeData) != -1)
03346                                 {
03347                                     proxDist = hit.dist;
03348                                     madd_v3_v3v3fl(hitCo, ray_start, proj_ray, hit.dist);   /* Calculate final hit coordinates */
03349                                     hQuad = (hit.no[0] == 1.0f);
03350                                     face = hit.index;
03351                                 }
03352                             }
03353 
03354                             /* If a hit was found, calculate required values    */
03355                             if (proxDist >= 0.0f && proxDist <= brush_radius) {
03356                                 proximity_factor = proxDist / brush_radius;
03357                                 CLAMP(proximity_factor, 0.0f, 1.0f);
03358                                 if (!inner_proximity)
03359                                     proximity_factor = 1.0f - proximity_factor;
03360 
03361                                 hit_found = HIT_PROXIMITY;
03362 
03363                                 /* if no volume hit, use prox point face info */
03364                                 if (hitFace == -1) {
03365                                     copy_v3_v3(hitCoord, hitCo);
03366                                     hitQuad = hQuad;
03367                                     hitFace = face;
03368                                 }
03369                             }
03370                         }
03371 
03372                         /* mix final sample strength depending on brush settings */
03373                         if (hit_found) {
03374                             /* if "negate volume" enabled, negate all factors within volume*/
03375                             if (brush->collision == MOD_DPAINT_COL_VOLDIST && brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_NEGATE_VOLUME) {
03376                                 volume_factor = 1.0f - volume_factor;
03377                                 if (inner_proximity)
03378                                     proximity_factor = 1.0f - proximity_factor;
03379                             }
03380 
03381                             /* apply final sample depending on final hit type */
03382                             if (hit_found == HIT_VOLUME) {
03383                                 sampleStrength = volume_factor;
03384                             }
03385                             else if (hit_found == HIT_PROXIMITY) {
03386                                 /* apply falloff curve to the proximity_factor */
03387                                 if (brush->proximity_falloff == MOD_DPAINT_PRFALL_RAMP && do_colorband(brush->paint_ramp, (1.0f-proximity_factor), prox_colorband))
03388                                     proximity_factor = prox_colorband[3];
03389                                 else if (brush->proximity_falloff == MOD_DPAINT_PRFALL_CONSTANT)
03390                                     proximity_factor = (!inner_proximity || brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_NEGATE_VOLUME) ? 1.0f : 0.0f;
03391                                 /* apply sample */
03392                                 sampleStrength = proximity_factor;
03393                             }
03394 
03395                             sampleStrength *= sample_factor;
03396                         }
03397                         else continue;
03398 
03399                         /* velocity brush, only do on main sample */
03400                         if (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_USES_VELOCITY && ss==0 && brushVelocity) {
03401                             int v1,v2,v3;
03402                             float weights[4];
03403                             float brushPointVelocity[3];
03404                             float velocity[3];
03405 
03406                             if (!hitQuad) {
03407                                 v1 = mface[hitFace].v1;
03408                                 v2 = mface[hitFace].v2;
03409                                 v3 = mface[hitFace].v3;
03410                             }
03411                             else {
03412                                 v1 = mface[hitFace].v2;
03413                                 v2 = mface[hitFace].v3;
03414                                 v3 = mface[hitFace].v4;
03415                             }
03416                             /* calculate barycentric weights for hit point */
03417                             interp_weights_face_v3(weights, mvert[v1].co, mvert[v2].co, mvert[v3].co, NULL, hitCoord);
03418 
03419                             /* simple check based on brush surface velocity,
03420                             *  todo: perhaps implement something that handles volume movement as well */
03421                             
03422                             /* interpolate vertex speed vectors to get hit point velocity */    
03423                             interp_v3_v3v3v3(   brushPointVelocity,
03424                                                 brushVelocity[v1].v,
03425                                                 brushVelocity[v2].v,
03426                                                 brushVelocity[v3].v, weights);
03427 
03428                             /* substract canvas point velocity */
03429                             if (bData->velocity) {
03430                                 sub_v3_v3v3(velocity, brushPointVelocity, bData->velocity[index].v);
03431                             }
03432                             else {
03433                                 copy_v3_v3(velocity, brushPointVelocity);
03434                             }
03435                             velocity_val = len_v3(velocity);
03436 
03437                             /* if brush has smudge enabled store brush velocity */
03438                             if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT &&
03439                                 brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_DO_SMUDGE && bData->brush_velocity) {
03440                                 copy_v3_v3(&bData->brush_velocity[index*4], velocity);
03441                                 mul_v3_fl(&bData->brush_velocity[index*4], 1.0f/velocity_val);
03442                                 bData->brush_velocity[index*4+3] = velocity_val;
03443                             }
03444                         }
03445 
03446                         /*
03447                         *   Process hit color and alpha
03448                         */
03449                         if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT)
03450                         {
03451                             float sampleColor[3];
03452                             float alpha_factor = 1.0f;
03453 
03454                             sampleColor[0] = brush->r;
03455                             sampleColor[1] = brush->g;
03456                             sampleColor[2] = brush->b;
03457                         
03458                             /* Get material+textures color on hit point if required */
03459                             if (brush_usesMaterial(brush, scene))
03460                                 dynamicPaint_doMaterialTex(bMats, sampleColor, &alpha_factor, brushOb, bData->realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]+ss].v, hitCoord, hitFace, hitQuad, brush->dm);
03461 
03462                             /* Sample proximity colorband if required   */
03463                             if ((hit_found == HIT_PROXIMITY) && (brush->proximity_falloff == MOD_DPAINT_PRFALL_RAMP)) {
03464                                 if (!(brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_RAMP_ALPHA)) {
03465                                     sampleColor[0] = prox_colorband[0];
03466                                     sampleColor[1] = prox_colorband[1];
03467                                     sampleColor[2] = prox_colorband[2];
03468                                 }
03469                             }
03470 
03471                             /* Add AA sample */
03472                             paintColor[0] += sampleColor[0];
03473                             paintColor[1] += sampleColor[1];
03474                             paintColor[2] += sampleColor[2];
03475                             sampleStrength *= alpha_factor;
03476                             numOfHits++;
03477                         }
03478 
03479                         /* apply sample strength */
03480                         brushStrength += sampleStrength;
03481                     } // end supersampling
03482 
03483 
03484                     /* if any sample was inside paint range */
03485                     if (brushStrength > 0.0f || depth > 0.0f) {
03486 
03487                         /* apply supersampling results  */
03488                         if (samples > 1) {
03489                             brushStrength /= total_sample;
03490                         }
03491                         CLAMP(brushStrength, 0.0f, 1.0f);
03492 
03493                         if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT) {
03494                             /* Get final pixel color and alpha  */
03495                             paintColor[0] /= numOfHits;
03496                             paintColor[1] /= numOfHits;
03497                             paintColor[2] /= numOfHits;
03498                         }
03499                         /* get final object space depth */
03500                         else if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_DISPLACE ||
03501                                 surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_WAVE) {
03502                             depth /= bData->bNormal[index].normal_scale * total_sample;
03503                         }
03504                         
03505                         dynamicPaint_updatePointData(surface, index, brush, paintColor, brushStrength, depth, velocity_val, timescale);
03506                     }
03507                 }
03508             }
03509         }
03510         /* free bvh tree */
03511         free_bvhtree_from_mesh(&treeData);
03512         dm->release(dm);
03513 
03514     }
03515 
03516     /* free brush velocity data */
03517     if (brushVelocity)
03518         MEM_freeN(brushVelocity);
03519 
03520     return 1;
03521 }
03522 
03523 /*
03524 *   Paint a particle system to the surface
03525 */
03526 static int dynamicPaint_paintParticles(DynamicPaintSurface *surface,
03527                                        ParticleSystem *psys,
03528                                        DynamicPaintBrushSettings *brush,
03529                                        float timescale)
03530 {
03531     ParticleSettings *part=psys->part;
03532     ParticleData *pa = NULL;
03533     PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
03534     PaintBakeData *bData = sData->bData;
03535     VolumeGrid *grid = bData->grid; 
03536 
03537     KDTree *tree;
03538     int particlesAdded = 0;
03539     int invalidParticles = 0;
03540     int p = 0;
03541 
03542     float solidradius = surface->radius_scale*((brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_PART_RAD) ? psys->part->size : brush->particle_radius);
03543     float smooth = brush->particle_smooth*surface->radius_scale;
03544 
03545     float range = solidradius + smooth;
03546     float particle_timestep = 0.04f * part->timetweak;
03547 
03548     Bounds3D part_bb = {0};
03549 
03550     if (psys->totpart < 1) return 1;
03551 
03552     /*
03553     *   Build a kd-tree to optimize distance search
03554     */
03555     tree= BLI_kdtree_new(psys->totpart);
03556 
03557     /* loop through particles and insert valid ones to the tree */
03558     for (p=0, pa=psys->particles; p<psys->totpart; p++, pa++)   {
03559 
03560         /* Proceed only if particle is active   */
03561         if (pa->alive == PARS_UNBORN && (part->flag & PART_UNBORN)==0) continue;                                    
03562         else if (pa->alive == PARS_DEAD && (part->flag & PART_DIED)==0) continue;                                   
03563         else if (pa->flag & PARS_UNEXIST) continue;
03564 
03565         /*  for debug purposes check if any NAN particle proceeds
03566         *   For some reason they get past activity check, this should rule most of them out */
03567         if (isnan(pa->state.co[0]) || isnan(pa->state.co[1]) || isnan(pa->state.co[2])) {invalidParticles++;continue;}
03568 
03569         /* make sure particle is close enough to canvas */
03570         if (!boundIntersectPoint(&grid->grid_bounds, pa->state.co, range)) continue;
03571 
03572         BLI_kdtree_insert(tree, p, pa->state.co, NULL);
03573 
03574         /* calc particle system bounds */
03575         boundInsert(&part_bb, pa->state.co);
03576 
03577         particlesAdded++;
03578     }
03579     if (invalidParticles)
03580         printf("Warning: Invalid particle(s) found!\n");
03581 
03582     /* If no suitable particles were found, exit    */
03583     if (particlesAdded < 1) {
03584         BLI_kdtree_free(tree);
03585         return 1;
03586     }
03587 
03588     /* begin thread safe malloc */
03589     BLI_begin_threaded_malloc();
03590 
03591     /* only continue if particle bb is close enough to canvas bb */
03592     if (boundsIntersectDist(&grid->grid_bounds, &part_bb, range))
03593     {
03594         int c_index;
03595         int total_cells = grid->dim[0]*grid->dim[1]*grid->dim[2];
03596         
03597         /* balance tree */
03598         BLI_kdtree_balance(tree);
03599 
03600         /* loop through space partitioning grid */
03601         for (c_index=0; c_index<total_cells; c_index++) {
03602             int id;
03603 
03604             /* check cell bounding box */
03605             if (!grid->s_num[c_index] ||
03606                 !boundsIntersectDist(&grid->bounds[c_index], &part_bb, range))
03607                 continue;
03608 
03609             /* loop through cell points */
03610             #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
03611             for (id = 0; id < grid->s_num[c_index]; id++)
03612             {
03613                 int index = grid->t_index[grid->s_pos[c_index] + id];
03614                 float disp_intersect = 0.0f;
03615                 float radius = 0.0f;
03616                 float strength = 0.0f;
03617                 float velocity_val = 0.0f;
03618                 int part_index= -1;
03619 
03620                 /*
03621                 *   With predefined radius, there is no variation between particles.
03622                 *   It's enough to just find the nearest one.
03623                 */
03624                 {
03625                     KDTreeNearest nearest;
03626                     float smooth_range, part_solidradius;
03627 
03628                     /* Find nearest particle and get distance to it */
03629                     BLI_kdtree_find_nearest(tree, bData->realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]].v, NULL, &nearest);
03630                     /* if outside maximum range, no other particle can influence either */
03631                     if (nearest.dist > range) continue;
03632 
03633                     if (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_PART_RAD) {
03634                         /* use particles individual size */
03635                         ParticleData *pa = psys->particles + nearest.index;
03636                         part_solidradius = pa->size;
03637                     }
03638                     else {
03639                         part_solidradius = solidradius;
03640                     }
03641                     radius = part_solidradius + smooth;
03642                     if (nearest.dist < radius) {
03643                         /* distances inside solid radius has maximum influence -> dist = 0  */
03644                         smooth_range = (nearest.dist - part_solidradius);
03645                         if (smooth_range<0.0f) smooth_range=0.0f;
03646                         /* do smoothness if enabled */
03647                         if (smooth) smooth_range/=smooth;
03648 
03649                         strength = 1.0f - smooth_range;
03650                         disp_intersect = radius - nearest.dist;
03651                         part_index = nearest.index;
03652                     }
03653                 }
03654                 /* If using random per particle radius and closest particle didn't give max influence   */
03655                 if (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_PART_RAD && strength < 1.0f && psys->part->randsize > 0.0f) {
03656                     /*
03657                     *   If we use per particle radius, we have to sample all particles
03658                     *   within max radius range
03659                     */
03660                     KDTreeNearest *nearest;
03661 
03662                     int n, particles = 0;
03663                     float smooth_range = smooth * (1.0f-strength), dist;
03664                     /* calculate max range that can have particles with higher influence than the nearest one */
03665                     float max_range = smooth - strength*smooth + solidradius;
03666 
03667                     particles = BLI_kdtree_range_search(tree, max_range, bData->realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]].v, NULL, &nearest);
03668 
03669                     /* Find particle that produces highest influence */
03670                     for (n=0; n<particles; n++) {
03671                         ParticleData *pa = psys->particles + nearest[n].index;
03672                         float s_range;
03673 
03674                         /* skip if out of range */
03675                         if (nearest[n].dist > (pa->size + smooth))
03676                             continue;
03677 
03678                         /* update hit data */
03679                         s_range = nearest[n].dist - pa->size;
03680                         /* skip if higher influence is already found */
03681                         if (smooth_range < s_range)
03682                             continue;
03683 
03684                         /* update hit data */
03685                         smooth_range = s_range;
03686                         dist = nearest[n].dist;
03687                         part_index = nearest[n].index;
03688 
03689                         /* If inside solid range and no disp depth required, no need to seek further */
03690                         if ( (s_range < 0.0f) &&
03691                              (surface->type != MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_DISPLACE) &&
03692                              (surface->type != MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_WAVE))
03693                         {
03694                             break;
03695                         }
03696                     }
03697 
03698                     if (nearest) MEM_freeN(nearest);
03699 
03700                     /* now calculate influence for this particle */
03701                     {
03702                         float rad = radius + smooth, str;
03703                         if ((rad-dist) > disp_intersect) {
03704                             disp_intersect = radius - dist;
03705                             radius = rad;
03706                         }
03707 
03708                         /* do smoothness if enabled */
03709                         if (smooth_range<0.0f) smooth_range=0.0f;
03710                         if (smooth) smooth_range/=smooth;
03711                         str = 1.0f - smooth_range;
03712                         /* if influence is greater, use this one    */
03713                         if (str > strength) strength = str;
03714                     }
03715                 }
03716 
03717                 if (strength > 0.001f)
03718                 {
03719                     float paintColor[4] = {0.0f};
03720                     float depth = 0.0f;
03721 
03722                     /* apply velocity */
03723                     if ((brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_USES_VELOCITY) && (part_index != -1)) {
03724                         float velocity[3];
03725                         ParticleData *pa = psys->particles + part_index;
03726                         mul_v3_v3fl(velocity, pa->state.vel, particle_timestep);
03727 
03728                         /* substract canvas point velocity */
03729                         if (bData->velocity) {
03730                             sub_v3_v3(velocity, bData->velocity[index].v);
03731                         }
03732                         velocity_val = len_v3(velocity);
03733 
03734                         /* store brush velocity for smudge */
03735                         if ( (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT) &&
03736                              (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_DO_SMUDGE && bData->brush_velocity))
03737                         {
03738                             copy_v3_v3(&bData->brush_velocity[index*4], velocity);
03739                             mul_v3_fl(&bData->brush_velocity[index*4], 1.0f/velocity_val);
03740                             bData->brush_velocity[index*4+3] = velocity_val;
03741                         }
03742                     }
03743 
03744                     if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT) {
03745                         copy_v3_v3(paintColor, &brush->r);
03746                     }
03747                     else if ( (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_DISPLACE) ||
03748                               (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_WAVE))
03749                     {
03750                          /* get displace depth  */
03751                         disp_intersect = (1.0f - sqrtf(disp_intersect / radius)) * radius;
03752                         depth = (radius - disp_intersect) / bData->bNormal[index].normal_scale;
03753                         if (depth<0.0f) depth = 0.0f;
03754                     }
03755                     
03756                     dynamicPaint_updatePointData(surface, index, brush, paintColor, strength, depth, velocity_val, timescale);
