03757                 }
03758             }
03759         }
03760     }
03761     BLI_end_threaded_malloc();
03762     BLI_kdtree_free(tree);
03763 
03764     return 1;
03765 }
03766 
03767 /* paint a single point of defined proximity radius to the surface */
03768 static int dynamicPaint_paintSinglePoint(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, float *pointCoord, DynamicPaintBrushSettings *brush,
03769                                          Object *brushOb, BrushMaterials *bMats, Scene *scene, float timescale)
03770 {
03771     int index;
03772     float brush_radius = brush->paint_distance * surface->radius_scale;
03773     PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
03774     PaintBakeData *bData = sData->bData;
03775     Vec3f brushVel;
03776 
03777     if (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_USES_VELOCITY)
03778         dynamicPaint_brushObjectCalculateVelocity(scene, brushOb, &brushVel, timescale);
03779 
03780     /*
03781     *   Loop through every surface point
03782     */
03783     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
03784     for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++)
03785     {
03786         float distance = len_v3v3(pointCoord, bData->realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]].v);
03787         float colorband[4] = {0.0f};
03788         float strength;
03789 
03790         if (distance > brush_radius) continue;
03791 
03792         /* Smooth range or color ramp   */
03793         if (brush->proximity_falloff == MOD_DPAINT_PRFALL_SMOOTH ||
03794             brush->proximity_falloff == MOD_DPAINT_PRFALL_RAMP) {
03795             
03796             strength = 1.0f - distance / brush_radius;
03797             CLAMP(strength, 0.0f, 1.0f);
03798         }
03799         else strength = 1.0f;
03800 
03801         if (strength >= 0.001f) {
03802             float paintColor[3] = {0.0f};
03803             float depth = 0.0f;
03804             float velocity_val = 0.0f;
03805 
03806             /* material */
03807             if (brush_usesMaterial(brush, scene)) {
03808                 float alpha_factor = 1.0f;
03809                 float hit_coord[3];
03810                 MVert *mvert = brush->dm->getVertArray(brush->dm);
03811                 /* use dummy coord of first vertex */
03812                 copy_v3_v3(hit_coord, mvert[0].co);
03813                 mul_m4_v3(brushOb->obmat, hit_coord);
03814 
03815                 dynamicPaint_doMaterialTex(bMats, paintColor, &alpha_factor, brushOb, bData->realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]].v, hit_coord, 0, 0, brush->dm);
03816             }
03817 
03818             /* color ramp */
03819             if (brush->proximity_falloff == MOD_DPAINT_PRFALL_RAMP && do_colorband(brush->paint_ramp, (1.0f-strength), colorband))
03820                 strength = colorband[3];
03821 
03822             if (brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_USES_VELOCITY) {
03823                 float velocity[3];
03824 
03825                 /* substract canvas point velocity */
03826                 if (bData->velocity) {
03827                     sub_v3_v3v3(velocity, brushVel.v, bData->velocity[index].v);
03828                 }
03829                 else {
03830                     copy_v3_v3(velocity, brushVel.v);
03831                 }
03832                 velocity_val = len_v3(velocity);
03833 
03834                 /* store brush velocity for smudge */
03835                 if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT && 
03836                     brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_DO_SMUDGE && bData->brush_velocity) {
03837                     copy_v3_v3(&bData->brush_velocity[index*4], velocity);
03838                     mul_v3_fl(&bData->brush_velocity[index*4], 1.0f/velocity_val);
03839                     bData->brush_velocity[index*4+3] = velocity_val;
03840                 }
03841             }
03842 
03843             if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT) {
03844                 if (brush->proximity_falloff == MOD_DPAINT_PRFALL_RAMP &&
03845                     !(brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_RAMP_ALPHA)) {
03846                     paintColor[0] = colorband[0];
03847                     paintColor[1] = colorband[1];
03848                     paintColor[2] = colorband[2];
03849                 }
03850                 else {
03851                     if (!brush_usesMaterial(brush, scene)) {
03852                         paintColor[0] = brush->r;
03853                         paintColor[1] = brush->g;
03854                         paintColor[2] = brush->b;
03855                     }
03856                 }
03857             }
03858             else if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_DISPLACE ||
03859                      surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_WAVE) {
03860                  /* get displace depth  */
03861                 float disp_intersect = (1.0f - sqrtf((brush_radius-distance) / brush_radius)) * brush_radius;
03862                 depth = (brush_radius - disp_intersect) / bData->bNormal[index].normal_scale;
03863                 if (depth<0.0f) depth = 0.0f;
03864             }
03865             dynamicPaint_updatePointData(surface, index, brush, paintColor, strength, depth, velocity_val, timescale);
03866         }
03867     }
03868 
03869     return 1;
03870 }
03871 
03872 
03873 /***************************** Dynamic Paint Step / Baking ******************************/
03874 
03875 /*
03876 *   Calculate current frame distances and directions for adjacency data
03877 */
03878 static void dynamicPaint_prepareAdjacencyData(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, int force_init)
03879 {
03880     PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
03881     PaintBakeData *bData = sData->bData;
03882     BakeAdjPoint *bNeighs;
03883     PaintAdjData *adj_data = sData->adj_data;
03884     Vec3f *realCoord = bData->realCoord;
03885     int index;
03886 
03887     if ((!surface_usesAdjDistance(surface) && !force_init) || !sData->adj_data) return;
03888 
03889     if (bData->bNeighs) MEM_freeN(bData->bNeighs);
03890     bNeighs = bData->bNeighs = MEM_mallocN(sData->adj_data->total_targets*sizeof(struct BakeAdjPoint),"PaintEffectBake");
03891     if (!bNeighs) return;
03892 
03893     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
03894     for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++)
03895     {
03896         int i;
03897         int numOfNeighs = adj_data->n_num[index];
03898 
03899         for (i=0; i<numOfNeighs; i++) {
03900             int n_index = adj_data->n_index[index]+i;
03901             int t_index = adj_data->n_target[n_index];
03902 
03903             /* dir vec */
03904             sub_v3_v3v3(bNeighs[n_index].dir, realCoord[bData->s_pos[t_index]].v, realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]].v);
03905             /* dist */
03906             bNeighs[n_index].dist = len_v3(bNeighs[n_index].dir);
03907             /* normalize dir */
03908             if (bNeighs[n_index].dist) mul_v3_fl(bNeighs[n_index].dir, 1.0f/bNeighs[n_index].dist);
03909         }
03910     }
03911 
03912     /* calculate average values (single thread) */
03913     bData->average_dist = 0.0f;
03914     for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++)
03915     {
03916         int i;
03917         int numOfNeighs = adj_data->n_num[index];
03918 
03919         for (i=0; i<numOfNeighs; i++) {
03920             bData->average_dist += (double)bNeighs[adj_data->n_index[index]+i].dist;
03921         }
03922     }
03923     bData->average_dist  /= adj_data->total_targets;
03924 }
03925 
03926 /* find two adjacency points (closest_id) and influence (closest_d) to move paint towards when affected by a force  */
03927 void surface_determineForceTargetPoints(PaintSurfaceData *sData, int index, float force[3], float closest_d[2], int closest_id[2])
03928 {
03929     BakeAdjPoint *bNeighs = sData->bData->bNeighs;
03930     int numOfNeighs = sData->adj_data->n_num[index];
03931     int i;
03932 
03933     closest_id[0]=closest_id[1]= -1;
03934     closest_d[0]=closest_d[1]= -1.0f;
03935 
03936     /* find closest neigh */
03937     for (i=0; i<numOfNeighs; i++) {
03938         int n_index = sData->adj_data->n_index[index]+i;
03939         float dir_dot = dot_v3v3(bNeighs[n_index].dir, force);
03940 
03941         if (dir_dot>closest_d[0] && dir_dot>0.0f) {closest_d[0]=dir_dot; closest_id[0]=n_index;}
03942     }
03943 
03944     if (closest_d[0] < 0.0f) return;
03945 
03946     /* find second closest neigh */
03947     for (i=0; i<numOfNeighs; i++) {
03948         int n_index = sData->adj_data->n_index[index]+i;
03949         float dir_dot = dot_v3v3(bNeighs[n_index].dir, force);
03950         float closest_dot = dot_v3v3(bNeighs[n_index].dir, bNeighs[closest_id[0]].dir);
03951 
03952         if (n_index == closest_id[0]) continue;
03953 
03954         /* only accept neighbor at "other side" of the first one in relation to force dir
03955         *  so make sure angle between this and closest neigh is greater than first angle */
03956         if (dir_dot>closest_d[1] && closest_dot<closest_d[0] && dir_dot>0.0f) {closest_d[1]=dir_dot; closest_id[1]=n_index;}
03957     }
03958 
03959     /* if two valid neighs found, calculate how force effect is divided
03960     *  evenly between them (so that d[0]+d[1] = 1.0)*/
03961     if (closest_id[1] != -1) {
03962         float force_proj[3];
03963         float tangent[3];
03964         float neigh_diff = acosf(dot_v3v3(bNeighs[closest_id[0]].dir, bNeighs[closest_id[1]].dir));
03965         float force_intersect;
03966         float temp;
03967 
03968         /* project force vector on the plane determined by these two neightbour points
03969         *  and calculate relative force angle from it*/
03970         cross_v3_v3v3(tangent, bNeighs[closest_id[0]].dir, bNeighs[closest_id[1]].dir);
03971         normalize_v3(tangent);
03972         force_intersect = dot_v3v3(force, tangent);
03973         madd_v3_v3v3fl(force_proj, force, tangent, (-1.0f)*force_intersect);
03974         normalize_v3(force_proj);
03975 
03976         /* get drip factor based on force dir in relation to angle between those neighbors */
03977         temp = dot_v3v3(bNeighs[closest_id[0]].dir, force_proj);
03978         CLAMP(temp, -1.0f, 1.0f); /* float precision might cause values > 1.0f that return infinite */
03979         closest_d[1] = acosf(temp)/neigh_diff;
03980         closest_d[0] = 1.0f - closest_d[1];
03981 
03982         /* and multiply depending on how deeply force intersects surface */
03983         temp = fabs(force_intersect);
03984         CLAMP(temp, 0.0f, 1.0f);
03985         closest_d[0] *= acosf(temp)/1.57079633f;
03986         closest_d[1] *= acosf(temp)/1.57079633f;
03987     }
03988     else {
03989         /* if only single neighbor, still linearize force intersection effect */
03990         closest_d[0] = 1.0f - acosf(closest_d[0])/1.57079633f;
03991     }
03992 }
03993 
03994 static void dynamicPaint_doSmudge(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, DynamicPaintBrushSettings *brush, float timescale)
03995 {
03996     PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
03997     PaintBakeData *bData = sData->bData;
03998     BakeAdjPoint *bNeighs = sData->bData->bNeighs;
03999     int index, steps, step;
04000     float eff_scale, max_velocity = 0.0f;
04001 
04002     if (!sData->adj_data) return;
04003 
04004     /* find max velocity */
04005     for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++) {
04006         float vel = bData->brush_velocity[index*4+3];
04007         if (vel > max_velocity) max_velocity = vel;
04008     }
04009 
04010     steps = (int)ceil(max_velocity / bData->average_dist * timescale);
04011     CLAMP(steps, 0, 12);
04012     eff_scale = brush->smudge_strength/(float)steps*timescale;
04013 
04014     for (step=0; step<steps; step++) {
04015 
04016         for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++) {
04017             int i;
04018             PaintPoint *pPoint = &((PaintPoint*)sData->type_data)[index];
04019             float smudge_str = bData->brush_velocity[index*4+3];
04020 
04021             /* force targets */
04022             int closest_id[2];
04023             float closest_d[2];
04024 
04025             if (!smudge_str) continue;
04026             
04027             /* get force affect points */
04028             surface_determineForceTargetPoints(sData, index, &bData->brush_velocity[index*4], closest_d, closest_id);
04029 
04030             /* Apply movement towards those two points */
04031             for (i=0; i<2; i++) {
04032                 int n_index = closest_id[i];
04033                 if (n_index != -1 && closest_d[i]>0.0f) {
04034                     float dir_dot = closest_d[i], dir_factor;
04035                     float speed_scale = eff_scale*smudge_str/bNeighs[n_index].dist;
04036                     PaintPoint *ePoint = &((PaintPoint*)sData->type_data)[sData->adj_data->n_target[n_index]];
04037 
04038                     /* just skip if angle is too extreme */
04039                     if (dir_dot <= 0.0f) continue;
04040 
04041                     dir_factor = dir_dot * speed_scale;
04042                     if (dir_factor > brush->smudge_strength) dir_factor = brush->smudge_strength;
04043 
04044                     /* mix new color and alpha */
04045                     mixColors(ePoint->color, ePoint->alpha, pPoint->color, pPoint->alpha, dir_factor);
04046                     ePoint->alpha = ePoint->alpha*(1.0f-dir_factor) + pPoint->alpha*dir_factor;
04047 
04048                     /* smudge "wet layer" */
04049                     mixColors(ePoint->e_color, ePoint->e_alpha, pPoint->e_color, pPoint->e_alpha, dir_factor);
04050                     ePoint->e_alpha = ePoint->e_alpha*(1.0f-dir_factor) + pPoint->e_alpha*dir_factor;
04051                     pPoint->wetness *= (1.0f-dir_factor);
04052                 }
04053             }
04054         }
04055     }
04056 }
04057 
04058 /*
04059 *   Prepare data required by effects for current frame.
04060 *   Returns number of steps required
04061 */
04062 static int dynamicPaint_prepareEffectStep(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, Scene *scene, Object *ob, float **force, float timescale)
04063 {
04064     double average_force = 0.0f;
04065     float shrink_speed=0.0f, spread_speed=0.0f;
04066     float fastest_effect, avg_dist;
04067     int steps;
04068     PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
04069     PaintBakeData *bData = sData->bData;
04070     Vec3f *realCoord = bData->realCoord;
04071     int index;
04072 
04073     /* Init force data if required */
04074     if (surface->effect & MOD_DPAINT_EFFECT_DO_DRIP) {
04075         float vel[3] = {0};
04076         ListBase *effectors = pdInitEffectors(scene, ob, NULL, surface->effector_weights);
04077 
04078         /* allocate memory for force data (dir vector + strength) */
04079         *force = MEM_mallocN(sData->total_points*4*sizeof(float), "PaintEffectForces");
04080 
04081         if (*force) {
04082             #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
04083             for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++)
04084             {
04085                 float forc[3] = {0};
04086 
04087                 /* apply force fields */
04088                 if (effectors) {
04089                     EffectedPoint epoint;
04090                     pd_point_from_loc(scene, realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]].v, vel, index, &epoint);
04091                     epoint.vel_to_sec = 1.0f;
04092                     pdDoEffectors(effectors, NULL, surface->effector_weights, &epoint, forc, NULL);
04093                 }
04094 
04095                 /* if global gravity is enabled, add it too */
04096                 if (scene->physics_settings.flag & PHYS_GLOBAL_GRAVITY)
04097                     /* also divide by 10 to about match default grav
04098                     *  with default force strength (1.0) */
04099                     madd_v3_v3fl(forc, scene->physics_settings.gravity, 
04100                                 surface->effector_weights->global_gravity*surface->effector_weights->weight[0] / 10.f);
04101 
04102                 /* add surface point velocity and acceleration if enabled */
04103                 if (bData->velocity) {
04104                     if (surface->drip_vel)
04105                         madd_v3_v3fl(forc, bData->velocity[index].v, surface->drip_vel*(-1.0f));
04106 
04107                     /* acceleration */
04108                     if (bData->prev_velocity && surface->drip_acc) {
04109                         float acc[3];
04110                         copy_v3_v3(acc, bData->velocity[index].v);
04111                         sub_v3_v3(acc, bData->prev_velocity[index].v);
04112                         madd_v3_v3fl(forc, acc, surface->drip_acc*(-1.0f));
04113                     }
04114                 }
04115 
04116                 /* force strength */
04117                 (*force)[index*4+3] = len_v3(forc);
04118                 /* normalize and copy */
04119                 if ((*force)[index*4+3]) mul_v3_fl(forc, 1.0f/(*force)[index*4+3]);
04120                 copy_v3_v3(&((*force)[index*4]), forc);
04121             }
04122 
04123             /* calculate average values (single thread) */
04124             for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++)
04125             {
04126                 average_force += (*force)[index*4+3];
04127             }
04128             average_force /= sData->total_points;
04129         }
04130         pdEndEffectors(&effectors);
04131     }
04132 
04133     /* Get number of required steps using averate point distance
04134     *  so that just a few ultra close pixels wont up substeps to max */
04135 
04136     /* adjust number of required substep by fastest active effect */
04137     if (surface->effect & MOD_DPAINT_EFFECT_DO_SPREAD)
04138         spread_speed = surface->spread_speed;
04139     if (surface->effect & MOD_DPAINT_EFFECT_DO_SHRINK)
04140         shrink_speed = surface->shrink_speed;
04141 
04142     fastest_effect = MAX3(spread_speed, shrink_speed, average_force);
04143     avg_dist = bData->average_dist*CANVAS_REL_SIZE/getSurfaceDimension(sData);
04144 
04145     steps = (int)ceil(1.5f*EFF_MOVEMENT_PER_FRAME*fastest_effect/avg_dist*timescale);
04146     CLAMP(steps, 1, 20);
04147 
04148     return steps;
04149 }
04150 
04154 static void dynamicPaint_doEffectStep(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, float *force, PaintPoint *prevPoint, float timescale, float steps)
04155 {
04156     PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
04157     BakeAdjPoint *bNeighs = sData->bData->bNeighs;
04158     float distance_scale = getSurfaceDimension(sData)/CANVAS_REL_SIZE;
04159     int index;
04160     timescale /= steps;
04161 
04162     if (!sData->adj_data) return;
04163 
04164     /*
04165      *  Spread Effect
04166      */
04167     if (surface->effect & MOD_DPAINT_EFFECT_DO_SPREAD) {
04168         float eff_scale = distance_scale*EFF_MOVEMENT_PER_FRAME*surface->spread_speed*timescale;
04169 
04170         /* Copy current surface to the previous points array to read unmodified values  */
04171         memcpy(prevPoint, sData->type_data, sData->total_points*sizeof(struct PaintPoint));
04172 
04173         #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
04174         for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++)
04175         {
04176             int i;
04177             int numOfNeighs = sData->adj_data->n_num[index];
04178             PaintPoint *pPoint = &((PaintPoint*)sData->type_data)[index];
04179 
04180             /*  Only reads values from the surface copy (prevPoint[]),
04181              *  so this one is thread safe */
04182 
04183             /*  Loop through neighboring points */
04184             for (i=0; i<numOfNeighs; i++) {
04185                 int n_index = sData->adj_data->n_index[index]+i;
04186                 float w_factor;
04187                 PaintPoint *ePoint = &prevPoint[sData->adj_data->n_target[n_index]];
04188                 float speed_scale = (bNeighs[n_index].dist<eff_scale) ? 1.0f : eff_scale/bNeighs[n_index].dist;
04189                 float color_mix = (MIN3(ePoint->wetness, pPoint->wetness, 1.0f))*0.25f*surface->color_spread_speed;
04190 
04191                 /* do color mixing */
04192                 if (color_mix) mixColors(pPoint->e_color, pPoint->e_alpha, ePoint->e_color, ePoint->e_alpha, color_mix);
04193 
04194                 /* Only continue if surrounding point has higher wetness */
04195                 if (ePoint->wetness<pPoint->wetness || ePoint->wetness<MIN_WETNESS) continue;
04196 
04197                 w_factor = 1.0f/numOfNeighs * MIN2(ePoint->wetness, 1.0f) * speed_scale;
04198                 CLAMP(w_factor, 0.0f, 1.0f);
04199 
04200                 /* mix new wetness and color */
04201                 pPoint->wetness = (1.0f-w_factor)*pPoint->wetness + w_factor*ePoint->wetness;
04202                 pPoint->e_alpha = mixColors(pPoint->e_color, pPoint->e_alpha, ePoint->e_color, ePoint->e_alpha, w_factor);
04203             }
04204         }
04205     }
04206 
04207     /*
04208      *  Shrink Effect
04209      */
04210     if (surface->effect & MOD_DPAINT_EFFECT_DO_SHRINK) {
04211         float eff_scale = distance_scale*EFF_MOVEMENT_PER_FRAME*surface->shrink_speed*timescale;
04212 
04213         /* Copy current surface to the previous points array to read unmodified values  */
04214         memcpy(prevPoint, sData->type_data, sData->total_points*sizeof(struct PaintPoint));
04215 
04216         #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
04217         for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++)
04218         {
04219             int i;
04220             int numOfNeighs = sData->adj_data->n_num[index];
04221             float totalAlpha = 0.0f;
04222             PaintPoint *pPoint = &((PaintPoint*)sData->type_data)[index];
04223 
04224             for (i=0; i<numOfNeighs; i++) {
04225                 int n_index = sData->adj_data->n_index[index]+i;
04226                 float speed_scale = (bNeighs[n_index].dist<eff_scale) ? 1.0f : eff_scale/bNeighs[n_index].dist;
04227                 PaintPoint *ePoint = &prevPoint[sData->adj_data->n_target[n_index]];
04228                 float a_factor, ea_factor, w_factor;
04229 
04230                 totalAlpha += ePoint->e_alpha;
04231 
04232                 /* Check if neighboring point has lower alpha,
04233                  *  if so, decrease this point's alpha as well*/
04234                 if (pPoint->alpha <= 0.0f && pPoint->e_alpha <= 0.0f && pPoint->wetness <= 0.0f) continue;
04235 
04236                 /* decrease factor for dry paint alpha */
04237                 a_factor = (1.0f - ePoint->alpha)/numOfNeighs * (pPoint->alpha - ePoint->alpha) * speed_scale;
04238                 if (a_factor < 0.0f) a_factor = 0.0f;
04239                 /* decrease factor for wet paint alpha */
04240                 ea_factor = (1.0f - ePoint->e_alpha)/8 * (pPoint->e_alpha - ePoint->e_alpha) * speed_scale;
04241                 if (ea_factor < 0.0f) ea_factor = 0.0f;
04242                 /* decrease factor for paint wetness */
04243                 w_factor = (1.0f - ePoint->wetness)/8 * (pPoint->wetness - ePoint->wetness) * speed_scale;
04244                 if (w_factor < 0.0f) w_factor = 0.0f;
04245 
04246                 pPoint->alpha -= a_factor;
04247                 if (pPoint->alpha < 0.0f) pPoint->alpha = 0.0f;
04248                 pPoint->e_alpha -= ea_factor;
04249                 if (pPoint->e_alpha < 0.0f) pPoint->e_alpha = 0.0f;
04250                 pPoint->wetness -= w_factor;
04251                 if (pPoint->wetness < 0.0f) pPoint->wetness = 0.0f;
04252             }
04253         }
04254     }
04255 
04256     /*
04257      *  Drip Effect
04258      */
04259     if (surface->effect & MOD_DPAINT_EFFECT_DO_DRIP && force) 
04260     {
04261         float eff_scale = distance_scale*EFF_MOVEMENT_PER_FRAME*timescale/2.0f;
04262         /* Copy current surface to the previous points array to read unmodified values  */
04263         memcpy(prevPoint, sData->type_data, sData->total_points*sizeof(struct PaintPoint));
04264 
04265         for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++) {
04266             int i;
04267             PaintPoint *pPoint = &((PaintPoint*)sData->type_data)[index];
04268             PaintPoint *pPoint_prev = &prevPoint[index];
04269 
04270             int closest_id[2];
04271             float closest_d[2];
04272 
04273             /* adjust drip speed depending on wetness */
04274             float w_factor = pPoint_prev->wetness - 0.025f;
04275             if (w_factor <= 0) continue;
04276             CLAMP(w_factor, 0.0f, 1.0f);
04277 
04278             /* get force affect points */
04279             surface_determineForceTargetPoints(sData, index, &force[index*4], closest_d, closest_id);
04280 
04281             /* Apply movement towards those two points */
04282             for (i=0; i<2; i++) {
04283                 int n_index = closest_id[i];
04284                 if (n_index != -1 && closest_d[i]>0.0f) {
04285                     float dir_dot = closest_d[i], dir_factor, a_factor;
04286                     float speed_scale = eff_scale*force[index*4+3]/bNeighs[n_index].dist;
04287                     PaintPoint *ePoint = &((PaintPoint*)sData->type_data)[sData->adj_data->n_target[n_index]];
04288                     float e_wet = ePoint->wetness;
04289 
04290                     /* just skip if angle is too extreme */
04291                     if (dir_dot <= 0.0f) continue;
04292 
04293                     dir_factor = dir_dot * MIN2(speed_scale, 1.0f) * w_factor;
04294                     if (dir_factor > 0.5f) dir_factor = 0.5f;
04295 
04296                     /* mix new wetness*/
04297                     ePoint->wetness += dir_factor;
04298                     CLAMP(ePoint->wetness, 0.0f, MAX_WETNESS);
04299 
04300                     /* mix new color */
04301                     a_factor = dir_factor / pPoint_prev->wetness;
04302                     CLAMP(a_factor, 0.0f, 1.0f);
04303                     mixColors(ePoint->e_color, ePoint->e_alpha, pPoint_prev->e_color, pPoint_prev->e_alpha, a_factor);
04304                     /* dripping is supposed to preserve alpha level */
04305                     if (pPoint_prev->e_alpha > ePoint->e_alpha) {
04306                         ePoint->e_alpha += a_factor * pPoint_prev->e_alpha;
04307                         if (ePoint->e_alpha > pPoint_prev->e_alpha)
04308                             ePoint->e_alpha = pPoint_prev->e_alpha;
04309                     }
04310 
04311                     /* decrease paint wetness on current point */
04312                     pPoint->wetness -= (ePoint->wetness - e_wet);
04313                     CLAMP(pPoint->wetness, 0.0f, MAX_WETNESS);
04314                 }
04315             }
04316         }
04317     }
04318 }
04319 
04320 void dynamicPaint_doWaveStep(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, float timescale)
04321 {
04322     PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
04323     BakeAdjPoint *bNeighs = sData->bData->bNeighs;
04324     int index;
04325     int steps, ss;
04326     float dt, min_dist, damp_factor;
04327     float wave_speed = surface->wave_speed;
04328     double average_dist = 0.0f;
04329     Bounds3D *mb = &sData->bData->mesh_bounds;
04330     float canvas_size = MAX3((mb->max[0]-mb->min[0]), (mb->max[1]-mb->min[1]), (mb->max[2]-mb->min[2]));
04331     float wave_scale = CANVAS_REL_SIZE/canvas_size;
04332 
04333     /* allocate memory */
04334     PaintWavePoint *prevPoint = MEM_mallocN(sData->total_points*sizeof(PaintWavePoint), "Temp previous points for wave simulation");
04335     if (!prevPoint) return;
04336 
04337     /* calculate average neigh distance (single thread) */
04338     for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++)
04339     {
04340         int i;
04341         int numOfNeighs = sData->adj_data->n_num[index];
04342 
04343         for (i=0; i<numOfNeighs; i++) {
04344             average_dist += bNeighs[sData->adj_data->n_index[index]+i].dist;
04345         }
04346     }
04347     average_dist  *= wave_scale/sData->adj_data->total_targets;
04348 
04349     /* determine number of required steps */
04350     steps = (int)ceil((WAVE_TIME_FAC*timescale*surface->wave_timescale) / (average_dist/wave_speed/3));
04351     CLAMP(steps, 1, 20);
04352     timescale /= steps;
04353 
04354     /* apply simulation values for final timescale */
04355     dt = WAVE_TIME_FAC*timescale*surface->wave_timescale;
04356     min_dist = wave_speed*dt*1.5f;
04357     damp_factor = pow((1.0f-surface->wave_damping), timescale*surface->wave_timescale);
04358 
04359     for (ss=0; ss<steps; ss++) {
04360 
04361         /* copy previous frame data */
04362         memcpy(prevPoint, sData->type_data, sData->total_points*sizeof(PaintWavePoint));
04363 
04364         #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
04365         for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++) {
04366             PaintWavePoint *wPoint = &((PaintWavePoint*)sData->type_data)[index];
04367             int numOfNeighs = sData->adj_data->n_num[index];
04368             float force = 0.0f, avg_dist = 0.0f, avg_height = 0.0f;
04369             int numOfN = 0, numOfRN = 0;
04370             int i;
04371 
04372             if (wPoint->state > 0) continue;
04373 
04374             /* calculate force from surrounding points */
04375             for (i=0; i<numOfNeighs; i++) {
04376                 int n_index = sData->adj_data->n_index[index]+i;
04377                 float dist = bNeighs[n_index].dist*wave_scale;
04378                 PaintWavePoint *tPoint = &prevPoint[sData->adj_data->n_target[n_index]];
04379 
04380                 if (!dist || tPoint->state>0) continue;
04381                 if (dist<min_dist) dist=min_dist;
04382                 avg_dist += dist;
04383                 numOfN++;
04384 
04385                 /* count average height for edge points for open borders */
04386                 if (!(sData->adj_data->flags[sData->adj_data->n_target[n_index]] & ADJ_ON_MESH_EDGE)) {
04387                     avg_height += tPoint->height;
04388                     numOfRN++;
04389                 }
04390 
04391                 force += (tPoint->height - wPoint->height) / (dist*dist);
04392             }
04393             avg_dist = (numOfN) ? avg_dist/numOfN : 0.0f;
04394 
04395             if (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_WAVE_OPEN_BORDERS &&
04396                 sData->adj_data->flags[index] & ADJ_ON_MESH_EDGE) {
04397                 /* if open borders, apply a fake height to keep waves going on */
04398                 avg_height = (numOfRN) ? avg_height/numOfRN : 0.0f;
04399                 wPoint->height = (dt*wave_speed*avg_height + wPoint->height*avg_dist) / (avg_dist + dt*wave_speed);
04400             }
04401             /* else do wave eq */
04402             else {
04403                 /* add force towards zero height based on average dist */
04404                 if (avg_dist)
04405                     force += (0.0f - wPoint->height) * surface->wave_spring / (avg_dist*avg_dist) / 2.0f;
04406 
04407                 /* change point velocity */
04408                 wPoint->velocity += force*dt * wave_speed*wave_speed;
04409                 /* damping */
04410                 wPoint->velocity *= damp_factor;
04411                 /* and new height */
04412                 wPoint->height += wPoint->velocity*dt;
04413             }
04414         }
04415     }
04416 
04417     /* reset state */
04418     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
04419     for (index = 0; index < sData->total_points; index++) {
04420         PaintWavePoint *wPoint = &((PaintWavePoint*)sData->type_data)[index];
04421         /* if there wasnt any brush intersection, clear isect height */
04422         if (wPoint->state == DPAINT_WAVE_NONE) {
04423             wPoint->brush_isect = 0.0f;
04424         }
04425         wPoint->state = DPAINT_WAVE_NONE;
04426     }
04427 
04428     MEM_freeN(prevPoint);
04429 }
04430 
04431 /* Do dissolve and fading effects */
04432 static void dynamicPaint_surfacePreStep(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, float timescale)
04433 {
04434     PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
04435     int index;
04436 
04437     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
04438     for (index=0; index<sData->total_points; index++)
04439     {
04440         /* Do drying dissolve effects */
04441         if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT) {
04442             PaintPoint *pPoint = &((PaintPoint*)sData->type_data)[index];
04443             /* drying */
04444             if (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_USE_DRYING) {
04445                 if (pPoint->wetness >= MIN_WETNESS) {
04446                     int i;
04447                     float dry_ratio, f_color[4];
04448                     float p_wetness = pPoint->wetness;
04449                     VALUE_DISSOLVE(pPoint->wetness, surface->dry_speed, timescale, (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_DRY_LOG));
04450                     if (pPoint->wetness<0.0f) pPoint->wetness=0.0f;
04451 
04452                     if (pPoint->wetness < surface->color_dry_threshold) {
04453                         dry_ratio = pPoint->wetness/p_wetness;
04454 
04455                         /*
04456                          *  Slowly "shift" paint from wet layer to dry layer as it drys:
04457                          */
04458                         /* make sure alpha values are within proper range */
04459                         CLAMP(pPoint->alpha, 0.0f, 1.0f);
04460                         CLAMP(pPoint->e_alpha, 0.0f, 1.0f);
04461 
04462                         /* get current final blended color of these layers */
04463                         blendColors(pPoint->color, pPoint->alpha, pPoint->e_color, pPoint->e_alpha, f_color);
04464                         /* reduce wet layer alpha by dry factor */
04465                         pPoint->e_alpha *= dry_ratio;
04466 
04467                         /* now calculate new alpha for dry layer that keeps final blended color unchanged */
04468                         pPoint->alpha = (f_color[3] - pPoint->e_alpha)/(1.0f-pPoint->e_alpha);
04469                         /* for each rgb component, calculate a new dry layer color that keeps the final blend color
04470                          *  with these new alpha values. (wet layer color doesnt change)*/
04471                         if (pPoint->alpha) {
04472                             for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
04473                                 pPoint->color[i] = (f_color[i]*f_color[3] - pPoint->e_color[i]*pPoint->e_alpha)/(pPoint->alpha*(1.0f-pPoint->e_alpha));
04474                             }
04475                         }
04476                     }
04477 
04478                     pPoint->state = DPAINT_PAINT_WET;
04479                 }
04480                 /* in case of just dryed paint, just mix it to the dry layer and mark it empty */
04481                 else if (pPoint->state > 0) {
04482                     float f_color[4];
04483                     blendColors(pPoint->color, pPoint->alpha, pPoint->e_color, pPoint->e_alpha, f_color);
04484                     copy_v3_v3(pPoint->color, f_color);
04485                     pPoint->alpha = f_color[3];
04486                     /* clear wet layer */
04487                     pPoint->wetness = 0.0f;
04488                     pPoint->e_alpha = 0.0f;
04489                     pPoint->state = DPAINT_PAINT_DRY;
04490                 }
04491             }
04492 
04493             if (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_DISSOLVE) {
04494                 VALUE_DISSOLVE(pPoint->alpha, surface->diss_speed, timescale, (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_DISSOLVE_LOG));
04495                 if (pPoint->alpha < 0.0f) pPoint->alpha = 0.0f;
04496 
04497                 VALUE_DISSOLVE(pPoint->e_alpha, surface->diss_speed, timescale, (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_DISSOLVE_LOG));
04498                 if (pPoint->e_alpha < 0.0f) pPoint->e_alpha = 0.0f;
04499             }
04500         }
04501         /* dissolve for float types */
04502         else if (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_DISSOLVE &&
04503                 (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_DISPLACE ||
04504                  surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_WEIGHT)) {
04505 
04506             float *point = &((float*)sData->type_data)[index];
04507             /* log or linear */
04508             VALUE_DISSOLVE(*point, surface->diss_speed, timescale, (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_DISSOLVE_LOG));
04509             if (*point < 0.0f) *point = 0.0f;
04510         }
04511     }
04512 }
04513 
04514 static int dynamicPaint_surfaceHasMoved(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, Object *ob)
04515 {
04516     PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
04517     PaintBakeData *bData = sData->bData;
04518     DerivedMesh *dm = surface->canvas->dm;
04519     MVert *mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
04520 
04521     int numOfVerts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
04522     int i;
04523     int ret = 0;
04524 
04525     if (!bData->prev_verts) return 1;
04526 
04527     /* matrix comparison */
04528     for (i=0; i<4; i++) {
04529         int j;
04530         for (j=0; j<4; j++)
04531         if (bData->prev_obmat[i][j] != ob->obmat[i][j]) return 1;
04532     }
04533 
04534     /* vertices */
04535     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
04536     for (i=0; i<numOfVerts; i++) {
04537         int j;
04538         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
04539             if (bData->prev_verts[i].co[j] != mvert[i].co[j]) {
04540                 ret = 1;
04541                 break;
04542             }
04543     }
04544 
04545     return ret;
04546 }
04547 
04548 static int surface_needsVelocityData(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, Scene *scene)
04549 {
04550     if (surface->effect & MOD_DPAINT_EFFECT_DO_DRIP)
04551         return 1;
04552 
04553     if (surface_getBrushFlags(surface, scene) & BRUSH_USES_VELOCITY)
04554         return 1;
04555 
04556     return 0;
04557 }
04558 
04559 static int surface_needsAccelerationData(DynamicPaintSurface *surface)
04560 {
04561     if (surface->effect & MOD_DPAINT_EFFECT_DO_DRIP)
04562         return 1;
04563 
04564     return 0;
04565 }
04566 
04567 /* Prepare for surface step by creating PaintBakeNormal data */
04568 static int dynamicPaint_generateBakeData(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, Scene *scene, Object *ob)
04569 {
04570     PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
04571     PaintAdjData *adj_data = sData->adj_data;
04572     PaintBakeData *bData = sData->bData;
04573     DerivedMesh *dm = surface->canvas->dm;
04574     int index, new_bdata = 0;
04575     int do_velocity_data = surface_needsVelocityData(surface, scene);
04576     int do_accel_data = surface_needsAccelerationData(surface);
04577 
04578     int canvasNumOfVerts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
04579     MVert *mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
04580     Vec3f *canvas_verts;
04581 
04582     if (bData) {
04583         int surface_moved = dynamicPaint_surfaceHasMoved(surface, ob);
04584 
04585         /* get previous speed for accelertaion */
04586         if (do_accel_data && bData->prev_velocity && bData->velocity)
04587             memcpy(bData->prev_velocity, bData->velocity, sData->total_points*sizeof(Vec3f));
04588 
04589         /* reset speed vectors */
04590         if (do_velocity_data && bData->velocity && (bData->clear || !surface_moved))
04591             memset(bData->velocity, 0, sData->total_points*sizeof(Vec3f));
04592 
04593         /* if previous data exists and mesh hasn't moved, no need to recalc */
04594         if (!surface_moved)
04595             return 1;
04596     }
04597 
04598     canvas_verts = (struct Vec3f *) MEM_mallocN(canvasNumOfVerts*sizeof(struct Vec3f), "Dynamic Paint transformed canvas verts");
04599     if (!canvas_verts) return 0;
04600 
04601     /* allocate memory if required */
04602     if (!bData) {
04603         sData->bData = bData = (struct PaintBakeData *) MEM_callocN(sizeof(struct PaintBakeData), "Dynamic Paint bake data");
04604         if (!bData) {
04605             if (canvas_verts) MEM_freeN(canvas_verts);
04606             return 0;
04607         }
04608 
04609         /* Init bdata */
04610         bData->bNormal = (struct PaintBakeNormal *) MEM_mallocN(sData->total_points*sizeof(struct PaintBakeNormal), "Dynamic Paint step data");
04611         bData->s_pos = MEM_mallocN(sData->total_points*sizeof(unsigned int), "Dynamic Paint bData s_pos");
04612         bData->s_num = MEM_mallocN(sData->total_points*sizeof(unsigned int), "Dynamic Paint bData s_num");
04613         bData->realCoord = (struct Vec3f *) MEM_mallocN(surface_totalSamples(surface)*sizeof(Vec3f), "Dynamic Paint point coords");
04614         bData->prev_verts = MEM_mallocN(canvasNumOfVerts*sizeof(MVert), "Dynamic Paint bData prev_verts");
04615 
04616         /* if any allocation failed, free everything */
04617         if (!bData->bNormal || !bData->s_pos || !bData->s_num || !bData->realCoord || !canvas_verts) {
04618             if (bData->bNormal) MEM_freeN(bData->bNormal);
04619             if (bData->s_pos) MEM_freeN(bData->s_pos);
04620             if (bData->s_num) MEM_freeN(bData->s_num);
04621             if (bData->realCoord) MEM_freeN(bData->realCoord);
04622             if (canvas_verts) MEM_freeN(canvas_verts);
04623 
04624             return setError(surface->canvas, "Not enough free memory.");
04625         }
04626 
04627         new_bdata = 1;
04628     }
04629 
04630     if (do_velocity_data && !bData->velocity) {
04631         bData->velocity = (struct Vec3f *) MEM_callocN(sData->total_points*sizeof(Vec3f), "Dynamic Paint velocity");
04632     }
04633     if (do_accel_data && !bData->prev_velocity) {
04634         bData->prev_velocity = (struct Vec3f *) MEM_mallocN(sData->total_points*sizeof(Vec3f), "Dynamic Paint prev velocity");
04635         /* copy previous vel */
04636         if (bData->prev_velocity && bData->velocity)
04637             memcpy(bData->prev_velocity, bData->velocity, sData->total_points*sizeof(Vec3f));
04638     }
04639 
04640     /*
04641      *  Make a transformed copy of canvas derived mesh vertices to avoid recalculation.
04642      */
04643     bData->mesh_bounds.valid = 0;
04644     for (index=0; index<canvasNumOfVerts; index++) {
04645         copy_v3_v3(canvas_verts[index].v, mvert[index].co);
04646         mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, canvas_verts[index].v);
04647         boundInsert(&bData->mesh_bounds, canvas_verts[index].v);
04648     }
04649 
04650     /*
04651      *  Prepare each surface point for a new step
04652      */
04653     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(static)
04654     for (index=0; index<sData->total_points; index++)
04655     {
04656         float prev_point[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
04657         if (do_velocity_data && !new_bdata) {
04658             copy_v3_v3(prev_point, bData->realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]].v);
04659         }
04660         /*
04661          *  Calculate current 3D-position and normal of each surface point
04662          */
04663         if (surface->format == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_F_IMAGESEQ) {
04664             float n1[3], n2[3], n3[3];
04665             ImgSeqFormatData *f_data = (ImgSeqFormatData*)sData->format_data;
04666             PaintUVPoint *tPoint = &((PaintUVPoint*)f_data->uv_p)[index];
04667             int ss;
04668 
04669             bData->s_num[index] = (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_ANTIALIAS) ? 5 : 1;
04670             bData->s_pos[index] = index * bData->s_num[index];
04671 
04672             /* per sample coordinates */
04673             for (ss=0; ss<bData->s_num[index]; ss++) {
04674                 interp_v3_v3v3v3(   bData->realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]+ss].v,
04675                     canvas_verts[tPoint->v1].v,
04676                     canvas_verts[tPoint->v2].v,
04677                     canvas_verts[tPoint->v3].v, f_data->barycentricWeights[index*bData->s_num[index]+ss].v);
04678             }
04679 
04680             /* Calculate current pixel surface normal   */
04681             normal_short_to_float_v3(n1, mvert[tPoint->v1].no);
04682             normal_short_to_float_v3(n2, mvert[tPoint->v2].no);
04683             normal_short_to_float_v3(n3, mvert[tPoint->v3].no);
04684 
04685             interp_v3_v3v3v3(   bData->bNormal[index].invNorm,
04686                 n1, n2, n3, f_data->barycentricWeights[index*bData->s_num[index]].v);
04687             mul_mat3_m4_v3(ob->obmat, bData->bNormal[index].invNorm);
04688             normalize_v3(bData->bNormal[index].invNorm);
04689             negate_v3(bData->bNormal[index].invNorm);
04690         }
04691         else if (surface->format == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_F_VERTEX) {
04692             int ss;
04693             if (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_ANTIALIAS && adj_data) {
04694                 bData->s_num[index] = adj_data->n_num[index]+1;
04695                 bData->s_pos[index] = adj_data->n_index[index]+index;
04696             }
04697             else {
04698                 bData->s_num[index] = 1;
04699                 bData->s_pos[index] = index;
04700             }
04701 
04702             /* calculate position for each sample */
04703             for (ss=0; ss<bData->s_num[index]; ss++) {
04704                 /* first sample is always point center */
04705                 copy_v3_v3(bData->realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]+ss].v, canvas_verts[index].v);
04706                 if (ss > 0) {
04707                     int t_index = adj_data->n_index[index]+(ss-1);
04708                     /* get vertex position at 1/3 of each neigh edge */
04709                     mul_v3_fl(bData->realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]+ss].v, 2.0f/3.0f);
04710                     madd_v3_v3fl(bData->realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]+ss].v, canvas_verts[adj_data->n_target[t_index]].v, 1.0f/3.0f);
04711                 }
04712             }
04713 
04714             /* normal */
04715             normal_short_to_float_v3(bData->bNormal[index].invNorm, mvert[index].no);
04716             mul_mat3_m4_v3(ob->obmat, bData->bNormal[index].invNorm);
04717             normalize_v3(bData->bNormal[index].invNorm);
04718             negate_v3(bData->bNormal[index].invNorm);
04719         }
04720 
04721         /* Prepare surface normal directional scale to easily convert
04722          *  brush intersection amount between global and local space */
04723         if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_DISPLACE ||
04724             surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_WAVE) {
04725             float temp_nor[3];
04726             if (surface->format == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_F_VERTEX) {
04727                 normal_short_to_float_v3(temp_nor, mvert[index].no);
04728                 normalize_v3(temp_nor);
04729             }
04730             else {
04731                 float n1[3], n2[3], n3[3];
04732                 ImgSeqFormatData *f_data = (ImgSeqFormatData*)sData->format_data;
04733                 PaintUVPoint *tPoint = &((PaintUVPoint*)f_data->uv_p)[index];
04734 
04735                 normal_short_to_float_v3(n1, mvert[tPoint->v1].no);
04736                 normal_short_to_float_v3(n2, mvert[tPoint->v2].no);
04737                 normal_short_to_float_v3(n3, mvert[tPoint->v3].no);
04738                 interp_v3_v3v3v3(temp_nor,
04739                     n1, n2, n3, f_data->barycentricWeights[index*bData->s_num[index]].v);
04740             }
04741 
04742             mul_v3_v3(temp_nor, ob->size);
04743             bData->bNormal[index].normal_scale = len_v3(temp_nor);
04744         }
04745 
04746         /* calculate speed vector */
04747         if (do_velocity_data && !new_bdata && !bData->clear) {
04748             sub_v3_v3v3(bData->velocity[index].v, bData->realCoord[bData->s_pos[index]].v, prev_point);
04749         }
04750     }
04751 
04752     MEM_freeN(canvas_verts);
04753 
04754     /* generate surface space partitioning grid */
04755     surfaceGenerateGrid(surface);
04756     /* calculate current frame adjacency point distances and global dirs */
04757     dynamicPaint_prepareAdjacencyData(surface, 0);
04758 
04759     /* Copy current frame vertices to check against in next frame */
04760     copy_m4_m4(bData->prev_obmat, ob->obmat);
04761     memcpy(bData->prev_verts, mvert, canvasNumOfVerts*sizeof(MVert));
04762 
04763     bData->clear = 0;
04764 
04765     return 1;
04766 }
04767 
04768 /*
04769  * Do Dynamic Paint step. Paints scene brush objects of current state/frame to the surface.
04770  */
04771 static int dynamicPaint_doStep(Scene *scene, Object *ob, DynamicPaintSurface *surface, float timescale, float subframe)
04772 {
04773     PaintSurfaceData *sData = surface->data;
04774     PaintBakeData *bData = sData->bData;
04775     DynamicPaintCanvasSettings *canvas = surface->canvas;
04776     int ret = 1;
04777     if (!sData || sData->total_points < 1) return 0;
04778 
04779     dynamicPaint_surfacePreStep(surface, timescale);
04780     /*
04781      * Loop through surface's target paint objects and do painting
04782      */
04783     {
04784         Base *base = NULL;
04785         GroupObject *go = NULL; 
04786         Object *brushObj = NULL;
04787         ModifierData *md = NULL;
04788 
04789         /* backup current scene frame */
04790         int scene_frame = scene->r.cfra;
04791         float scene_subframe = scene->r.subframe;
04792 
04793         /* either from group or from all objects */
04794         if (surface->brush_group)
04795             go = surface->brush_group->gobject.first;
04796         else
04797             base = scene->base.first;
04798 
04799         while (base || go)
04800         {
04801             brushObj = NULL;
04802             /* select object */
04803             if (surface->brush_group) {                     
04804                 if (go->ob) brushObj = go->ob;                  
04805             }                   
04806             else                        
04807                 brushObj = base->object;
04808 
04809             if (!brushObj) {            
04810                 /* skip item */
04811                 if (surface->brush_group) go = go->next;
04812                 else base= base->next;                  
04813                 continue;           
04814             }
04815 
04816             /* next item */
04817             if (surface->brush_group)
04818                 go = go->next;
04819             else
04820                 base= base->next;
04821 
04822             /* check if target has an active dp modifier    */
04823             md = modifiers_findByType(brushObj, eModifierType_DynamicPaint);
04824             if (md && md->mode & (eModifierMode_Realtime | eModifierMode_Render))                   
04825             {
04826                 DynamicPaintModifierData *pmd2 = (DynamicPaintModifierData *)md;
04827                 /* make sure we're dealing with a brush */
04828                 if (pmd2->brush)
04829                 {
04830                     DynamicPaintBrushSettings *brush = pmd2->brush;
04831                     BrushMaterials bMats = {0};
04832 
04833                     /* calculate brush speed vectors if required */
04834                     if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT && brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_DO_SMUDGE) {
04835                         bData->brush_velocity = MEM_callocN(sData->total_points*sizeof(float)*4, "Dynamic Paint brush velocity");
04836                         /* init adjacency data if not already */
04837                         if (!sData->adj_data)
04838                             dynamicPaint_initAdjacencyData(surface, 1);
04839                         if (!bData->bNeighs)
04840                             dynamicPaint_prepareAdjacencyData(surface, 1);
04841                     }
04842 
04843                     /* update object data on this subframe */
04844                     if (subframe) {
04845                         scene_setSubframe(scene, subframe);
04846                         subframe_updateObject(scene, brushObj, UPDATE_EVERYTHING, BKE_curframe(scene));
04847                     }
04848                     /* Prepare materials if required    */
04849                     if (brush_usesMaterial(brush, scene))
04850                         dynamicPaint_updateBrushMaterials(brushObj, brush->mat, scene, &bMats);
04851 
04852                     /* Apply brush on the surface depending on it's collision type */
04853                     /* Particle brush: */
04854                     if (brush->collision == MOD_DPAINT_COL_PSYS) {
04855                         if (brush && brush->psys && brush->psys->part && brush->psys->part->type==PART_EMITTER &&
04856                             psys_check_enabled(brushObj, brush->psys)) {
04857 
04858                             /* Paint a particle system */
04859                             BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(scene, &brush->psys->part->id, brush->psys->part->adt, BKE_curframe(scene), ADT_RECALC_ANIM);
04860                             dynamicPaint_paintParticles(surface, brush->psys, brush, timescale);
04861                         }
04862                     }
04863                     /* Object center distance: */
04864                     else if (brush->collision == MOD_DPAINT_COL_POINT && brushObj != ob) {
04865                         dynamicPaint_paintSinglePoint(surface, brushObj->loc, brush, brushObj, &bMats, scene, timescale);
04866                     }
04867                     /* Mesh volume/proximity: */
04868                     else if (brushObj != ob) {
04869                         dynamicPaint_paintMesh(surface, brush, brushObj, &bMats, scene, timescale);
04870                     }
04871 
04872                     /* free temp material data */
04873                     if (brush_usesMaterial(brush, scene))
04874                         dynamicPaint_freeBrushMaterials(&bMats);
04875                     /* reset object to it's original state */
04876                     if (subframe) {
04877                         scene->r.cfra = scene_frame;
04878                         scene->r.subframe = scene_subframe;
04879                         subframe_updateObject(scene, brushObj, UPDATE_EVERYTHING, BKE_curframe(scene));
04880                     }
04881 
04882                     /* process special brush effects, like smudge */
04883                     if (bData->brush_velocity) {
04884                         if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT && brush->flags & MOD_DPAINT_DO_SMUDGE)
04885                             dynamicPaint_doSmudge(surface, brush, timescale);
04886                         MEM_freeN(bData->brush_velocity);
04887                         bData->brush_velocity = NULL;
04888                     }
04889                 }
04890             }
04891         }
04892     }
04893 
04894     /* surfaces operations that use adjacency data */
04895     if (sData->adj_data && bData->bNeighs) {
04896         /* wave type surface simulation step */
04897         if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_WAVE) {
04898             dynamicPaint_doWaveStep(surface, timescale);
04899         }
04900 
04901         /* paint surface effects */
04902         if (surface->effect && surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT) {
04903             int steps = 1, s;
04904             PaintPoint *prevPoint;
04905             float *force = NULL;
04906 
04907             /* Allocate memory for surface previous points to read unchanged values from    */
04908             prevPoint = MEM_mallocN(sData->total_points*sizeof(struct PaintPoint), "PaintSurfaceDataCopy");
04909             if (!prevPoint)
04910                 return setError(canvas, "Not enough free memory.");
04911 
04912             /* Prepare effects and get number of required steps */
04913             steps = dynamicPaint_prepareEffectStep(surface, scene, ob, &force, timescale);
04914             for (s = 0; s < steps; s++) {
04915                 dynamicPaint_doEffectStep(surface, force, prevPoint, timescale, (float)steps);
04916             }
04917 
04918             /* Free temporary effect data   */
04919             if (prevPoint) MEM_freeN(prevPoint);
04920             if (force) MEM_freeN(force);
04921         }
04922     }
04923 
04924     return ret;
04925 }
04926 
04927 /*
04928  * Calculate a single frame and included subframes for surface
04929  */
04930 int dynamicPaint_calculateFrame(DynamicPaintSurface *surface, Scene *scene, Object *cObject, int frame)
04931 {
04932     float timescale = 1.0f;
04933 
04934     /* apply previous displace on derivedmesh if incremental surface */
04935     if (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_DISP_INCREMENTAL)
04936         dynamicPaint_applySurfaceDisplace(surface, surface->canvas->dm);
04937 
04938     /* update bake data */
04939     dynamicPaint_generateBakeData(surface, scene, cObject); 
04940     
04941     /* don't do substeps for first frame */
04942     if (surface->substeps && (frame != surface->start_frame)) {
04943         int st;
04944         timescale = 1.0f / (surface->substeps+1);
04945 
04946         for (st = 1; st <= surface->substeps; st++) {
04947             float subframe = ((float) st) / (surface->substeps+1);
04948             if (!dynamicPaint_doStep(scene, cObject, surface, timescale, subframe)) return 0;
04949         }
04950     }
04951 
04952     return dynamicPaint_doStep(scene, cObject, surface, timescale, 0.0f);
04953 }
